description: "Learn Hangul!!" is a game that helps to memorize the basic Korean syllabary, Hangul. You have 3 lives which deplete after each wrong answer. Try to get the highest possible score!
Title: Learn Hangul!!

description: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE 6 launches on July 25, 2024. Let's get ready to go to work! Purchasers will be entitled to the full game & bonus DLC for both the PS4™ and PS5™ versions. Plus, even more benefits! ◆PlayStation ® Store purchase benefits◆ ・Air Raider Boarding Weapons: Powered Exoskeleton Nix Metal Coat *Only for customers who purchase the game on PlayStation ® Store by 23:59, December 24, 2024. ◆Exclusive DLC◆ ・Exclusive DLC: Recruiter (Takanashi Kiara) ・Exclusive DLC: Recruiter (Gawr Gura) ・Exclusive DLC: Recruiter (IRyS) *Only for customers who purchase the game on PlayStation ® Store by 23:59, December 24, 2024. **The above benefits are subject to change or addition without notice.** - Live the future of despair. Story: The year is 2024 AD. Mankind has won the long battle against the unknown invaders. The enemy Primers are now gone and peace has returned to Mother Earth. However, the population has shrunk to 10% and the world was on the verge of collapse. The survivors fought against the remaining threats while trying their best to continue their recovery. Three years passed in the year 2027. In a new world without hope, the time has come to once again resist the fate of the Earth. Save the future of Earth in the new world. The identity of the invader that has long tormented Earth is finally revealed. A chain of deep despair that strikes in a devastated world for the first time in the series...But your presence as a soldier of the EDF will lead humanity to the greatest joy. Now you must face it with courage and wisdom. The largest volume in the history of the series. Supports online co-op play. The largest number of missions and weapons ever included. All missions support online co-op play for up to four players. Offline co-op play is also available in split-screen mode. Take control of four different soldier classes and fight alongside real EDF members from across the country.
Title: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE 6

description: Lead your team to glory in F1® Manager 2024. A new Formula 1® season has arrived, and with it, the most comprehensive F1® management experience to date. Build a legacy with one of 10 official F1® constructors or create your own team for the very first time. Plan and direct your team’s strategy and watch as your driver’s execute your commands in thrilling F1 races, brought to life with a broadcast-quality presentation. Manage your drivers, staff, car development and facilities throughout multiple seasons to give your team the best chance to claim a spot on the Formula 1 podium. NEW FOR 2024 CREATE A TEAM For the first time in the series, create your own team to challenge the grid and forge a new legacy. Customise every element of your team from your origin and livery design to logo and racing suits. Recruit the right staff and drivers and negotiate with sponsors for placement on your car. DEEPER MANAGEMENT The dramatic world of F1 comes to life on and off the track with the brand-new Mentality System. Manage the personalities and needs of your staff and drivers in the pursuit of success. Keep your stars happy to avoid allowing rivals from poaching your talent, disrupting your team’s trajectory towards the top. Build a legacy by fostering talents from F2 & F3 to add to your own affiliate pool. Access the stars of the future and ensure their success is your success. F1 RACES BROUGHT TO LIFE Circuits visuals have been refreshed for the official 2024 season, including the returning Shanghai International Circuit. Improved track marbling and enhanced use of real-world data mean racing lines are clearer than ever, with enhanced trackside detailing providing the best-looking visual presentation to date. Helicam provides a strategic bird’s eye view on the action, giving you a new perspective when executing and evolving your race day plans Races present ever-evolving challenges and opportunities with the introduction of Mechanical Failures. Can you mitigate these issues as they arise to stay on track? Ensure you are in position to capitalise on rivals' issues and claim unexpected results. MORE TO DISCOVER • 2024 F1® Sprint race format • 2024 driver and staff roster, including drivers from development and team academies • Improved approachability including refreshed data visualisations, the option to simulate the full race weekend, and enhanced tutorials • Race Replay returns for another thrilling season, allowing you to relive and redefine moments from the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship™
Title: F1® Manager 2024 Deluxe Edition

description: Immerse yourself in a tale of honor and revenge in Samurai Katana Rampage: Stickman Saga. Embark on a perilous journey as a young and fearless warrior to avenge the attack on your village and restore honor to your family. Master the art of combat, navigate treacherous landscapes, and face formidable foes on your quest for justice. Will you rise to become a legendary warrior? Features: - Vengeance Story: Unravel the story behind the attack and fight for justice. - Master Combat: Hone your skills and master various weapons to defeat your enemies. - Variety of Weapons: Choose from knives, swords, staffs, and more to find your preferred combat style. - Intense Battles: Test your skills against skilled fighters and challenging enemies. - Treacherous Landscapes: Explore diverse environments and navigate treacherous terrains. - Epic Adventure: An immersive story filled with action, drama, and the ultimate quest for justice.
Title: Samurai Katana Rampage: Stickman Saga

description: This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game. In the year 2138, auto racing has undergone a renaissance after being taken to new and distant planets. A whole new championship has been designed on the planet Proteus, mixing natural terrain with the most challenging obstacles that nanobots could bring into deep space. Boost-powered, high-speed open-wheel cars produce aggressive racing and suspense at every turn. The drivers, racing via long-distance transmission from Earth, are celebrities here—and you’re next in line. Highlights include: • 4-way contact patch traction technology and soft body tire model for the ultimate in off-road handling • 19 unique circuits (each with reverse configurations) across four distinct zones • Three distinct race vehicles, headlined by the untamed, gravel-throwing Titan XC-7000 • Six championship series that see you fight your way to the top • 48 Challenges that show your speed across every zone • Limited-time Special Events that put you up against the global community on exciting remixes of each zone • Online racing that mixes circuit and Challenge layouts to determine the best of the best If you already own the PS4® version of this game, you can get the PS5® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4® disc copy must insert it into the PS5® every time they want to download or play the PS5® digital version. PS4® game disc owners who buy the PS5® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5® version at no extra cost.
Title: ExoCross

description: Sink ships in a shooting gallery
Title: Cazzarion: Shooting Gallery

description: Learn to react quickly to unconventional situations. Maneuver your way through sneaky enemies and use your attacks to destroy planetary defenses.
Title: Planet Divers

description: Learn to react quickly to unconventional situations. Maneuver your way through sneaky enemies and use your attacks to destroy planetary defenses.
Title: Planet Divers

description: Block Tower TD is a roguelike tower defense strategy game with interesting innovations. Build a world out of blocks, choose random upgrades to make every run unique. CREATING THE WORLD The world consists of blocks that you can place anywhere. Thanks to this, you will be able to think over a defense plan. BUILD TOWERS Tower locations are the most important aspect in tower defense games. This aspect becomes even more valuable in Block Tower: you can build towers on high ground, leave free blocks for resource extraction or later strong towers. In addition, all towers have an experience bar, the earlier you build it, the stronger it will be in the late game. CHOOSE UPGRADES The order in which upgrades are chosen in each game is very important. You can choose resource-based upgrades, magic tower upgrades, or upgrades for strong early defense, which will allow you to safely move into the late game. Combined with randomly generated blocks, this gives infinite replay value. RESOURCE MINING Think over your economic strategy. Early construction of economic buildings is risky, but gives a big boost in the late game. The random location of resources in each game sets new strategic questions that you will have to answer each time.
Title: Block Tower TD

description: Ultimate General: Gettysburg is a critically acclaimed tactical battle simulator that allows you to lead thousands of soldiers in the battle of Gettysburg as commander of either the Union or Confederate army. The game features the most accurately created map, complex morale, innovative control mechanics and smart AI. You have the freedom to use different strategies while the battle progresses. Your decisions and military performance play a crucial role in the result.
Title: Ultimate General: Gettysburg

description: Prepare for an adventure on a global scale! The Ticket to Ride®: Deluxe Edition has everything you need to kickstart your railway empire. With the base game, you’ll be able to explore North America with six characters, seven trains and six carriages to choose from. When you’re ready to chase new horizons, the Round the World Ticket included in this bundle will open up ten expansions – all currently released expansions will be playable immediately, then the remaining expansions as they release. Plus, enjoy two Ticket Packs – Europa 1912 and USA 1910, adding more Tickets and game modes! The Europe Expansion Play as Erika Ford and Bertie Hawkes, and power your enterprise with the Rocket and Dolomyte Dynamite Locomotives! Bonus content includes the Europa 1912 Ticket Pack, which adds three new game modes and new Tickets to the Europe Expansion map. The Nordic Expansion Build routes between colourful Nordic cities, claim the sprawling Murmansk route and earn the Globetrotter bonus in the world’s favourite train-adventure game! The India Expansion: Set off on a new adventure in India! New characters, locomotives and carriages await in this vibrant map. Rethink your strategies and think beyond single routes as you chase the elusive Mandala Bonus, awarded for completing tickets in multiple different ways! The Legendary Asia Expansion: Journey along the Silk Road and take on the mighty Himalayas in Legendary Asia! Make new friends in Wang Ling and Lê Chinh, add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet and aim for the Asian Explorer Bonus! INCLUDES: Base Ticket to Ride™ game The Round the World Ticket The European Expansion The Nordic Expansion The India Expansion The Legendary Asia Expansion Europa 1912 Ticket Pack USA 1910 Ticket Pack
Title: Ticket to Ride®: Deluxe Edition

description: Ticket to Ride® has arrived at Platform PlayStation! Discover a fresh adaptation of the iconic board game in stunning 3D. Join friends, family and fans around the world for a journey like no other. Build a railway empire that connects the most popular cities, claim the most exciting routes and dominate your competitors in this fan-favourite classic! INCLUDES: SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs – Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER – Revolutionary tech enables a new online multiplayer system, which offers seamless match-making and a truly social experience. AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE – Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY – Every game presents fresh challenges, and it’s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route. ONLY THE BEGINNING… – Build your railway network through North America and Europe, and prepare for new expansions! Contains: - Ticket to Ride® Base Game – the fan-favourite train-adventure game that started it all! - The European Expansion – includes the Europe map, two additional characters, two additional trains and two additional carriages
Title: Ticket to Ride

description: Dive into the immersive world of retail management with Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D! Step into the shoes of a savvy entrepreneur and become the proud owner of a bustling fishing shop. Cater to the needs of passionate anglers as you stock your store with an extensive array of fishing gear, equipment, and accessories. Key Features: Manage Your Store: Run your very own fishing supermarket, buying goods at competitive prices and selling them for a profit. Upgrade and Expand: Use your profits to upgrade your store, expand your inventory, and attract more customers. Realistic 3D Environment: Experience a detailed and immersive 3D world that brings your fishing supermarket to life. Strategic Planning: Balance supply and demand to maximize your profits and grow your business empire. Customer Satisfaction: Keep your customers happy with a diverse range of high-quality products and exceptional service. Whether you're a fan of fishing or just love business simulation games, Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D offers a unique and engaging experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Start your journey as a fishing market tycoon and reel in the profits today!
Title: Ultimate Fishing Supermarket Simulator 3D

description: This product entitles you to download both the digital PlayStation®4 version and the digital PlayStation®5 version of Co-omets and Shmoup.
Title: y-zo's shmup bundle

description: From games studio A44, makers of Ashen, comes an explosive Souls-lite, where Gods and guns collide in a battle for the future of humanity. The Door to the Great Below has been opened unleashing the Gods and their armies of the Dead. The lands of Kian are besieged, the city of Dawn is on the brink of destruction. It’s time for the Coalition army to fight back. Embrace vengeance, gunpowder and magic as you embark on an epic journey to defeat the Gods, close the door and retake the world. Your battle begins now. Kill. All. Gods. A Unique Companionship Step into the boots of Nor Vanek, an elite member of the Coalition army, joined by Enki, a mysterious fox-like companion, in their quest for vengeance against the Gods. Guided by Enki who shares his knowledge of the world with you, your combat skills and traversal capabilities will be imbued with his magical powers making you a duo to be reckoned with. An explosive souls-lite Flintlock retains elements of the souls-like genre and infuses it with rapid mobility resulting in dynamic and explosive combat. Weave in melee, gunpowder and magic in rhythmic battles where combos chain together to create a deadly dance. Use Nor's gunpowder abilities to exploit verticality to your advantage and deal death from above, or quickly recover from danger. A world scarred by the Gods Unleashed upon the world, the vengeful Gods are on a rampage, intent on causing chaos and the downfall of mankind. Traverse the ravaged landscape of Kian, utilizing Enki's magic and portals to soar through the skies while confronting hordes of the undead. Discover new equipment, strengthen your weapons, and upgrade your gear in anticipation of the ultimate showdown against the Gods.
Title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn

description: Step into the shoes of a supermarket owner in Supermarket Manager 2024, a dynamic 3D supermarket simulator where your business acumen will be put to the test! As the proud proprietor, your goal is to grow your supermarket empire by making smart purchasing decisions and optimizing your sales strategies. Key Features: Business Growth: Purchase a variety of products from different providers and strategically price them to attract more customers and maximize profits. Financial Management: Handle transactions with ease as customers pay with cash or credit cards. Use your earnings to invest back into your supermarket. Upgrades and Expansion: Reinvent your supermarket with upgrades and expansions. Enhance your store's layout, stock more products, and improve customer satisfaction to become the leading supermarket in town. Strategic Gameplay: Balance supply and demand, manage stock levels, and respond to customer preferences to keep your business thriving. Immersive 3D Environment: Experience the bustling atmosphere of a supermarket with stunning 3D graphics and detailed animations. Can you transform your modest store into a thriving retail giant? Find out in Supermarket Manager 2024, where every decision counts towards building your supermarket success story!
Title: Supermarket Manager 2024

description: Purchase the EA SPORTS™ MVP Bundle and receive: Madden NFL 25 Deluxe Edition College Football 25 Deluxe Edition (PS5 only) 4600 Madden Points 4600 College Football Points Elite MUT Player Item EA SPORTS™ MADDEN NFL 25 In Madden NFL 25, nothing hits like BOOM Tech; a new dynamic physics-based tackling system that lets you dominate the gridiron like a bonafide Madden NFL superstar. Physics-Based Tackling A new data-driven physics system considers timing, momentum, weight, speed, strength, and player ratings to inform every 1-on-1 ball carrier impact for a wider variety of explosive and authentic physical outcomes. Reloaded Hit Stick The reengineered Hit Stick uses a timing-based mechanic to provide harder-hitting control with more realistic physical movements and results. EA SPORTS™ COLLEGE FOOTBALL 25 In College Football 25 experience explosive gameplay variety across 134 FBS schools and immerse yourself in the iconic atmospheres of college football as you chase college greatness. CampusIQ™ Experience strategic, fast-paced, authentic college football gameplay with CampusIQ™. Test your strategic decision-making with an all-new composure system, player Wear & Tear and screen-shaking homefield advantages. Iconic Atmospheres Experience the decibel-shaking soundscape of college football putting you inside the stadium, alongside all the iconic rituals and traditions. This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items.
Title: EA SPORTS™ MVP Bundle

description: Purchase the EA SPORTS™ MVP Bundle and receive: Madden NFL 25 Deluxe Edition College Football 25 Deluxe Edition (PS5 only) 4600 Madden Points 4600 College Football Points Elite MUT Player Item EA SPORTS™ MADDEN NFL 25 In Madden NFL 25, nothing hits like BOOM Tech; a new dynamic physics-based tackling system that lets you dominate the gridiron like a bonafide Madden NFL superstar. Physics-Based Tackling A new data-driven physics system considers timing, momentum, weight, speed, strength, and player ratings to inform every 1-on-1 ball carrier impact for a wider variety of explosive and authentic physical outcomes. Reloaded Hit Stick The reengineered Hit Stick uses a timing-based mechanic to provide harder-hitting control with more realistic physical movements and results. EA SPORTS™ COLLEGE FOOTBALL 25 In College Football 25 experience explosive gameplay variety across 134 FBS schools and immerse yourself in the iconic atmospheres of college football as you chase college greatness. CampusIQ™ Experience strategic, fast-paced, authentic college football gameplay with CampusIQ™. Test your strategic decision-making with an all-new composure system, player Wear & Tear and screen-shaking homefield advantages. Iconic Atmospheres Experience the decibel-shaking soundscape of college football putting you inside the stadium, alongside all the iconic rituals and traditions. This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items.
Title: EA SPORTS™ MVP Bundle

description: "Destination Paradise" invites players on an immersive hidden object adventure across 20 meticulously crafted chapters, each unfolding in beautiful locations around the world. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter three distinct scenes within each chapter, presenting a delightful array of challenges. Engage your mind with a variety of puzzles, including traditional jigsaw, tile-swapping, and tile-rotation challenges. The game offers a dynamic mix of gameplay styles, including finding objects in a list, unscrambling letters to reveal hidden words, and a bonus riddle mode that adds an extra layer of intrigue. For those seeking an extra layer of mystery, the bonus riddle mode adds an intriguing dimension to the adventure. With its seamless blend of exploration, puzzle-solving, and breathtaking visuals, "Destination Paradise" promises an unforgettable gaming experience for both casual players and avid puzzle enthusiasts. - 20 immersive chapters with three unique scenes each. - Diverse puzzle types, including jigsaw, swap, rotate tiles, find objects in a list, missing vowels, scrambled letters, and bonus riddle mode. - Stunningly detailed locations from around the world. - Engaging and challenging gameplay suitable for both casual and experienced players. - Bonus riddle mode for an extra layer of mystery and excitement.
Title: Destination Paradise

description: Get ready to immerse yourself in an intriguing collection of new games with Just Find It 3! Uncover hidden differences, make exciting matches, challenge your memory, and solve engaging puzzles for surprising twists that will keep you captivated throughout your journey. - Play 7 kinds of games! - Search for bonus collectibles and extra hidden object challenges! - Make matches, find details, memory, montage, and swap tiles, too! - Play through the game in any order you want! - 25 extra bonus levels!
Title: Just Find It 3 Collector's Edition

description: On the day that Eleanor Grey moved to Silverwood Bay she finds an old brooch that included a mysterious and romantic note from Laurie to Amy from a package that her friend Josie gave her. Eleanor Grey used this romantic note as characters for the book she’s been wanting to write for so long, but she needed more. She decided to look around Silverwood Bay for more inspiration for her story, the town had much to offer her in that area. - Follow the story of Eleanor Grey - Solve a Romance Mystery - Go on an Adventure in Silverwood Bay - 28 chapters with 1-2 sub scenes - 28 subgames relating to the story
Title: Silverwood Bay: An Eleanor Grey Mystery

description: Collect coins in a circus but avoid the fire
Title: Cazzarion: Jumping Tiger

description: In this retro-style arcade game, you have to save your corn from the crows! Shoot the crows from a slingshot to prevent them from stealing corn! This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game. If you already own the PS4® version of this game, you can get the PS5® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4® disc copy must insert it into the PS5® every time they want to download or play the PS5® digital version. PS4® game disc owners who buy the PS5® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5® version at no extra cost.
Title: CORN GUARD

description: Step into the world of "Anime Girls Basketball League," a captivating 3D basketball simulator that combines the excitement of real-life basketball with the vibrant charm of anime style. Choose your favorite anime girl skin and hit the courts for an immersive and thrilling experience. In "Anime Girls Basketball League," every match is an opportunity to showcase your skills and earn rewards. Win matches to earn money, which you can use to unlock stunning new skins and exclusive stadiums. Whether you're aiming for the top of the leaderboard or simply enjoying the dynamic gameplay, this game offers endless fun and challenges. Features: Anime Style Gameplay: Enjoy basketball like never before with unique anime girl characters and stunning visuals. Customizable Skins: Choose from a variety of skins and personalize your character to stand out on the court. Exciting Matches: Participate in thrilling basketball matches and outplay your opponents to earn rewards. Unlockable Content: Use your hard-earned money to unlock new skins and stadiums, enhancing your gaming experience. Immersive Experience: Dive into a world where basketball and anime collide, offering a fresh and engaging experience for all players. Get ready to dribble, shoot, and score in "Anime Girls Basketball League" – where your basketball dreams come to life in anime style!
Title: Anime Girls Basketball League

description: Step into the vibrant world of Anime Girls - MMA Tournament, where the thrill of mixed martial arts collides with the enchanting allure of anime aesthetics. This 3D fighting simulator invites you to join a dynamic roster of anime girl fighters, each with their own unique skills, fighting styles, and captivating personalities. In Anime Girls - MMA Tournament, you will participate in a series of exhilarating championships, each designed to test your strategic thinking, reflexes, and combat prowess. Engage in fast-paced, action-packed battles in beautifully rendered arenas that bring the anime world to life. Every victory in the ring brings you closer to becoming the ultimate MMA champion. Earn money with each win and invest in your fighters to enhance their abilities. Upgrade their strength, speed, agility, and special moves to create the most formidable fighters in the tournament. As you progress, unlock new characters with diverse fighting techniques, adding depth and excitement to your roster. Explore a richly detailed anime universe filled with vibrant characters and immersive storylines. Customize your fighters' appearances and gear to reflect your personal style and preferences. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned fighter, Anime Girls - MMA Tournament offers a compelling and rewarding experience. Dive into the competitive world of MMA, where only the strongest and most skilled fighters will rise to the top. Can you lead your favorite anime girl to victory and become the reigning champion of the Anime Girls - MMA Tournament? The fight begins now!
Title: Anime Girls - MMA Tournament

description: Rise from the Digital Dust, Build a Futuristic Metropolis: Begin your journey in the neon-lit streets of a sprawling cyber city, where technology and ambition drive the pulse of progress. In Cyber City Tycoon, you are tasked with the monumental challenge of constructing a thriving cyberpunk metropolis from scratch. Architect of Tomorrow: As the city planner and ruler, your decisions shape the destiny of countless lives. Lay the foundation with resource management strategies that harness the wealth of digital and physical resources—extract rare minerals from high-tech mines, cultivate advanced biotech labs, and manage energy grids to sustain your growing populace. Master the Art of Cyber Engineering: Unlock advanced technological marvels as your city expands. Design intricate network systems to ensure seamless communication, and construct architectural wonders that stand as a testament to your city’s innovation. Each building not only enhances your city’s efficiency but also its futuristic grandeur. Forge Alliances, Defend Your City: No city grows in isolation. Forge strategic alliances with neighboring corporations and manage trade routes that bring exotic technologies to your city’s gates. Train elite security forces to defend against the ever-looming threat of cyber attacks and rogue factions, and fortify your city with barriers that can withstand any digital or physical assault. Conquer and Prosper: Embark on missions to expand your territory. Each conquest brings new challenges and opportunities. Establish satellite colonies, integrate outlying districts into your metropolis, and tap into their unique resources. Cyber Deities or Your Own Genius?: While the AI overseers watch over your progress, your choices determine your favor in their algorithms. Conduct digital ceremonies and build data temples to win their blessings—or face their wrath. Navigate a world where AI interventions can alter the course of your city’s fate. A Living City: Each citizen in your city has a role—from hackers and traders to executives and engineers. Their lives intertwine with your decisions, creating a dynamic tapestry of human and cyber stories driven by your rule. Cyber City Tycoon isn’t just about building a city; it’s about weaving the fabric of a high-tech empire that will stand the test of time. Are you ready to leave your mark on the future?
Title: Cyberpunk City Tycoon

description: Welcome to the untamed frontier! In "Wild West Tycoon Empire," you are tasked with transforming the rugged Wild West into a thriving economic powerhouse. This low-poly style simulation game invites you to master the art of frontier entrepreneurship where every decision counts and every enterprise takes you one step closer to building a legendary empire. Features: Frontier Agriculture: Cultivate a variety of Wild West crops such as Prairie Corn, Frontier Beans, and Pioneer Pumpkins. Each plant has unique requirements and benefits, challenging you to adapt and innovate farming techniques suitable for the Wild West. Town Building: Design and develop your own Wild West town from the ground up. Construct essential structures like saloons, general stores, and stables to ensure your town's growth and prosperity. Resource Management: Carefully manage limited resources such as water, timber, and gold. Make critical decisions to balance resource consumption with town expansion and efficiency. Research and Development: Unlock advanced technologies through research to improve your farming and building capabilities. Experiment with innovative irrigation systems and durable building materials to thrive in the harsh conditions of the Wild West. Survival Challenges: Face the realities of Wild West life, including droughts, dust storms, and bandit raids, which can threaten your crops and town's survival. Dynamic weather and event systems require quick thinking and robust contingency planning. Stunning Low-Poly Graphics: Enjoy a visually striking low-poly art style that brings the beauty and roughness of the Wild West to life. The simplistic yet captivating graphics make building your empire a truly enchanting experience. Embark on a unique entrepreneurial journey with "Wild West Tycoon Empire." Can you tame the wild frontier and build a new home for settlers?
Title: Wild West Tycoon

description: Famous cola and mint candy mix effect in the fast-paced runner game. Collect as many cola bottles as you can and blow them up with the mints. The more bottles you collect, the longer your jump will be. You don't have to follow the road if you don't want to - just use the jumps to change the lines and overtake your opponents in the race!
Title: Cola Riders

description: Famous cola and mint candy mix effect in the fast-paced runner game. Collect as many cola bottles as you can and blow them up with the mints. The more bottles you collect, the longer your jump will be. You don't have to follow the road if you don't want to - just use the jumps to change the lines and overtake your opponents in the race!
Title: Cola Riders

description: Thief Simulator 2 will transport you to a world full of valuables, expensive cars, and rustling banknotes. As long as you find a way to steal them. Know that a thief’s trade is not a piece of cake. In order to get some practice, you’ll start with petty theft. This is how you’ll gain the experience required to access more and more risky – and most importantly, more profitable – jobs. Gain levels and unlock new possibilities. Get useful tools. Together with newly acquired skills, they will pave the way to expensive items, which you can then sell on the black market. The tools of your trade include a crowbar and binoculars, as well as advanced equipment that becomes available as you progress, such as a laptop for hacking through security systems. The creators of Thief Simulator 2 have prepared two unique locations with houses, banks, restaurants, and other special places that you’ll get to strip of money, valuables, and other items. But before you do, examine the surroundings: find out when the building empties out, learn the tenants’ or the employees’ schedule. Then you just need to prepare a strategy and it’s gone time. Just be quick and efficient. You don’t have much time, so you’ll need to immediately assess which item to take and which one to leave. Can you handle the pressure, or will you panic? Make sure to work on cars between robbing buildings. Start with small family sedans and make gradual steps towards mastery, which will allow you to steal the coolest sports cars. Remember to keep your eyes around your head. Even the best plan can fall apart, and the local police are just waiting for a chance to put you in handcuffs. Don’t get caught. Always be one step ahead of law enforcement. Feature list: -Two neighbourhoods, with over 20 houses to break into. Learn tenant's routines, pick the right time to break in, and then rob them -Three heists, each with a unique location. Make your way into a resort with 6 houses full of loot, a warehouse crawling with guards, and a central bank with gold waiting to be snatched from the vault. -Get better and better tools, ranging from a crowbar or binoculars to hacking laptops, stethoscopes, etc. -Make your way into houses undetected, or run in welding a baton and knock everyone out. Alternatively, put them to sleep using sleeping gas or a tranquilizer gun. The choice is up to you. -Payphone missions - rob certain locations in a specified amount of time -Over 15 contracts requiring you to steal unique items -Level up your thief and acquire new skills, which allow a number of new possibilities. Learn special skills, and activate unique abilities. -Escape the police - intense chases with police cars and helicopters. Be careful to not get shot. -Upgrade your car, change its color, give it more power - or just buy a sports car and be no match for the police. -Steal cars - begin with a small, family sedan, and work your way up to a sport's dream car
Title: Thief Simulator 2

description: In True Virus, you play the role of a mental hospital patient who has awoken in a world devastated by a deadly pandemic. Your job is to explore the psychiatric hospital and its surroundings in search of clues to find out what really happened. Mystery As you traverse the twisted landscape of the abandoned city, you'll encounter a series of complex puzzles and thought-provoking challenges. Sharpen your problem-solving skills by unlocking hidden passages, deciphering cryptic codes and discovering hidden objects. Puzzle Solving Uncover secrets that hide in the darkness, revealing layer after layer of the disturbing story unfolding before you. Delve into the lives of forgotten patients and hospital staff, gradually piecing together their stories and their connection to the mysterious pandemic. Will you be able to defeat the abandoned psychiatric hospital and unravel the mystery behind the True Virus?
Title: True Virus

description: Join the world of BioStorm - a futuristic online third-person shooter where events unfold in an exciting and dangerous warehouse of biologically active substances. Players will plunge into an atmosphere of incredible technology and frantic battles, where every action can decide the fate of the entire operation. Bio-Arsenal of Death: From exploding grenades to powerful rifles, your arsenal in BioStorm consists of the deadliest and most advanced weapons. Feel the power of modified projectiles for maximum damage. Team Operations and PvP Battles: Join a team of your friends or engage in one-on-one combat with other players. BioStorm offers a variety of modes and epic battles
Title: BioStorm

description: Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game. Buy an abandoned gas station in the middle of nowhere and restore it to its former glory. Get rid of debris and broken furniture, fix up the walls, paint and decorate the place to your liking. Just don’t spend all your cash on the looks right away, you bought a gas station after all. Repair the equipment, buy what can’t be repaired and start serving your customers to earn money for further renovations and improvements. Can Touch This DLC Rebuild & Reconstruct! Take matters into your own hand. Almost literally. With the help of your new, trusty hammer, it's time to redecorate like you've never done before. Refurbish walls to your heart's content, changing their features and decor as you see fit. Decide where to put trash cans or where to move the cash register to. Direct the crowd. Show your customers the right way to orderly queue without taking too much space. It's time to take interior customisation to a completely new level. Paint & Spray! No need to stare at an empty canvas any longer! Grab your spray can and add a little personal touch to any surface you can lay your hands on. With adjustable scale and rotation, you can spray anything from large murals to tiny easter eggs hidden somewhere in the corners of your station. Combine existing decals with each other, creating even more elaborate and complex pieces of art. And whenever you start feeling like you're running out, more designs lie hidden all around for you to unlock! Warehouse & Workshop Did you ever feel like your station was missing something? That flair didn't quite measure up to par when looking beyond your main building? Have no fear for the future is here. From tables to desks to banners and lights, your Warehouse and Workshop now possess a full suite of purchasable customisations! Make the diamond in the sand shine even brighter than before. Airstrip DLC Meet Joe Joe is an old pilot flying an old single engine plane. He is a bit strange and one day approaches you to help him with his endeavours. For that he needs a place to land in the middle of nowhere to make a stop halfway to his destination. In return he is willing to cut you in on his deals. The Airstrip You have plenty of space and as it turned out, there used to be an old military landing strip during WWII close to your gas station. Should be that hard to make it work again, right? You might even go a step further, order some aviation fuel and some parts for planes. A windsock wouldn’t probably hurt and some lights might turn out to be useful, since you will on occasion also need to help him land. Let’s see how things develop and what Joe is up to... The Plane Joe’s plane is like its pilot: old. It’s also simple. The most advanced technology on this thing is the LED reading light Joe uses to find his way on the chart. How hard can it be to fix some simple things on a small plane? And it’s not like you are doing it for free. The Gameplay The Airstrip DLC brings new game mechanics and content to Gas Station Simulator based on events. Unlike the content we introduced in the past, it does not require your constant attention, it is more something that happens every now and then.
Title: Gas Station Simulator, Airstrip DLC and Can Touch This DLC Bundle

description: Gather, control, and lead your army on the road to glory. No obstacle can stop you. Prepare for the final battle and defeat every opponent along the way. Lead the army with care - your soldiers believe in you!
Title: The Boys Escape

description: Gather, control, and lead your army on the road to glory. No obstacle can stop you. Prepare for the final battle and defeat every opponent along the way. Lead the army with care - your soldiers believe in you!
Title: The Boys Escape

description: Prevent Doomsday AFTER it happened! Designed by the co-creator of Sang-Froid - Tales of Werewolves and featuring both a single-player and co-op campaign, TimeMelters is a strategy hero defense where you go back in time and fight alongside your past selves. Step into the shoes of Teagan, after a narrow escape from a witch trial, embark on a quest to unravel the mysteries surrounding her new powers and alter the course of the future. Get ready to engage in strategic battles against dangerous foes, manipulate the environment to your advantage, and explore a world teetering on the brink of doom. Featuring both a single-player and a co-op campaign, prepare for a fantastical and dark adventure with a unique twist on time-travel mechanics. Features: Unique Time Shift game mechanic: rewind time and fight alongside yourself, not as an AI, but in a fully deterministic fashion. Plan out truly custom strategies and play to your own style! Experience Co-op game mechanics (aggro, support, etc.) all while playing solo! Hybrid Action-Strategy gameplay: Plan a strategy and execute it all in real time, across distinct missions! Puzzle maps, boss fights, escort missions, survival, etc. -- each mission has distinct objectives and brings unique twists on the time travel mechanic! Co-op mode: Play the full campaign with a friend online (2 players)! Startling storyline: Engaging campaign with all the twists, turns, nooks, crannies and what-the-bleep-just-happened moments you would -- and should -- expect from a story based on Time Travel! Challenge: Test your brain power with 40 mind bending, 4D thinking challenges! Skill Tree: Choose how your spells upgrade -- yielding ever more powerful magic and intricate build choices! Original Soundtrack: Sumptuous, expansive soundtrack filled with epic moments (and a few earworms)!
Title: TimeMelters

description: Prune & Milo, a sister and a brother, are enjoying their sunny vacation while camping... During a walk, Milo falls into a ravine and ends up in a mysterious cave. Shortly after, he finds a stylish sword. Prune manages to join him and discovers a bow. The two children try to find a way back to the campsite... In this cave, they meet Christopher, an owl, who informs them that the end of the world is approaching. Their adventure begins. They will then attempt to prevent the catastrophe. Along the way, they will discover different environments and quirky characters... Embark on a dreamlike journey with Prune & Milo, armed with a stylish sword and a bow, as they try to unravel the mysteries of a cave. Explore 78 turn-based puzzle levels, each containing various mechanics. Traverse different environments, encounter eccentric characters, and prevent the end of the world in this captivating adventure. Features: - Turn-based puzzle game - 3 different worlds - 78 levels - 2 playable characters - Various mechanics in each world
Title: Prune & Milo

description: In Cyberpunk Samurai, you embody a warrior stripped of everything that once made you human—your flesh, your past, and even your voice. Thrust into a gritty, neon-lit world where biotech reigns supreme, this third-person swordplay adventure sets you on a relentless quest for retribution. Forge your path through the underbelly of a cyberpunk metropolis, where each shadowy corner and neon-lit alley holds the secrets to your past and the keys to your vengeance. Utilizing the visually stunning Unreal Engine, the game brings to life a breathtakingly immersive environment that is as perilous as it is picturesque. Key Features: Challenging Gameplay: Master the art of samurai combat with precision and skill, facing high-stakes challenges that will test even the most seasoned gamers. Immersive Worlds: Explore a variety of richly detailed environments crafted using the Unreal Engine, each teeming with secrets and hidden dangers. Formidable Adversaries: Encounter a roster of fearsome enemies, from cyber-enhanced thugs to advanced biotech creatures that challenge your every move. Epic Boss Battles: Confront towering big-bosses that will require all your wits, quick reflexes, and strategic thinking to defeat. Stylish Combat: Engage in fluid, dynamic combat with cool samurai animations that make every attack and counter a spectacle to behold. Unique Narrative: Unravel a compelling story of loss and revenge, where your journey is as much about reclaiming your identity as it is about settling old scores. Inspiration: Cyberpunk Samurai draws its inspiration from the timeless allure of samurai honor and the dystopian edge of cyberpunk aesthetics. Developed single-handedly by a dedicated indie developer, this game promises to deliver an unforgettable experience with every slice of the blade and every neon glow from the cyber-world. Embark on a quest not just for vengeance, but for identity in a world where the line between man and machine is blurred. Are you ready to redefine your destiny in the shadows of the cyberpunk city?
Title: Cyberpunk Samurai

description: A stylish 1-bit small arcade game about driving a car in order to break as many laws as possible! Beware of the cops!
Title: No Brakez

description: A stylish 1-bit small arcade game about driving a car in order to break as many laws as possible! Beware of the cops!
Title: No Brakez

description: Step into the bustling world of retail management with Supermarket Manager Simulator Empire 2024, a vibrant and engaging 3D market simulator. As the proud owner of your very own supermarket, your mission is to transform a humble store into a thriving retail empire! In this cartoon-styled adventure, you’ll have the freedom to upgrade every aspect of your supermarket. Expand your aisles, enhance your displays, and stock a diverse range of products to keep your customers satisfied and your profits soaring. From fresh produce to the latest gadgets, the choices are endless, and the power is in your hands. Key Features: Dynamic Upgrades: Continuously improve your supermarket with exciting upgrades that attract more customers and boost your revenue. Diverse Product Range: Buy and sell a wide variety of products, each with its own unique appeal and profit margins. Cartoon-Style Graphics: Enjoy a charming and whimsical visual experience that makes managing your supermarket fun and visually appealing. Strategic Management: Make savvy business decisions, manage your finances, and outsmart the competition to build the ultimate retail empire. Whether you're a strategic mastermind or just love the hustle and bustle of a busy market, Supermarket Manager Simulator Empire 2024 offers endless hours of fun and challenge. Are you ready to build your supermarket empire?
Title: Supermarket Manager Simulator Empire 2024

description: Spin Rhythm XD is a kinetic rhythm action game with smooth controls, hand-crafted levels and beautiful, reactive backgrounds. A homage to classic arcade rhythm games (Guitar Hero, DDR), with a modern aesthetic and soundtrack. Match colours and beats, spin, tap, flick and flow through the juiciest beats in the universe. For the first time ever Spin Rhythm XD features an optional (and completely free!) VR mode. This allows PlayStation®VR2 players to feel closer to the music than ever before with the smoothest motion controls we have ever been able to deliver. Featuring over 60 licensed and original tracks by Hyper Potions, Nitro Fun, Haywyre, Au5, Camellia, Anamanaguchi, Panda Eyes, Teminite, Pegboard Nerds, Akira Complex, Tokyo Machine, meganeko, Anomalie, Lena Raine, 2Mello, Moe Shop and more.
Title: Spin Rhythm XD

description: Contains Spin Rhythm XD game, Monstercat DLC, Chillhop DLC and Supporter Pack
Title: Spin Rhythm XD Deluxe Edition

description: GREEN HELL is an Open World Survival Simulator set in the unique and uncharted setting of the Amazonian rainforest. Plunge into the open world survival simulation set in the extreme conditions of the unforgiving Amazon jungle. Use real-life survival techniques to craft, hunt, fight, and gather resources. Build a makeshift shelter or raise a fortress, but always remember to tend to your wounds and maintain mental health. Survive on your own, or try your chances in an up-to-4-player online co-op mode. The PlayStation®5 edition of the game contains the highly acclaimed GREEN HELL experience, alongside the Spirits of Amazonia update with over 20 hours of additional gameplay. The game also includes the following content updates: - Animal Husbandry - Building Update - Storage & Transportation - Fortifications - Flamekeeper The PS5® version of the game is not compatible with the PS4® version due to differences in game content and online features.
Title: Green Hell

description: Prepare to defy gravity, leap across vibrant landscapes, and flip through enchanting environments in the ultimate parkour jump simulator! Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding world of "Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up," where you guide anime-style girls through a thrilling free-running adventure. Leap, vault, and sprint through diverse anime-inspired settings, each presenting its own unique obstacles and challenges. Your journey through this non-stop obstacle course isn’t just a game; it’s a captivating parkour odyssey. Main Features: - Enchanting Anime Environments: Dash and flip your way across beautifully crafted anime-style forests and houses, each packed with distinctive challenges that demand your parkour finesse. - Intuitive Controls: Master the easy-to-use swipe controls to unlock your full parkour potential and become a true urban ninja. - Thrilling Challenges: Conquer new obstacles, leap over gaps, and scale walls as you strategically navigate each level. Success isn’t just about speed; it’s about outsmarting the environment. - Social Competition: Share your awe-inspiring high scores, challenge your friends, and see who emerges as the ultimate anime runner. "Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up" isn’t just about reaching your destination; it’s about the exhilarating journey you take to get there. Every run presents an opportunity to innovate and push the boundaries of parkour. Whether you’re a seasoned parkour pro or a newcomer to the world of free-running, "Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up" guarantees a captivating and accessible experience that’s hard to put down. Lace up your sneakers, join the parkour craze, and always remember - in this game, the only way is UP!
Title: Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up

description: Kill Mosquitoes in the swamp. Hurry up before they disappear!
Title: Cazzarion: Mosquito Hunt

description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer its very best FMV Detective games! Featuring The Isle Tide Hotel, Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus? and The Shapeshifting Detective all in one bundle! THE ISLE TIDE HOTEL An absent father must rescue his teenage daughter from an eclectic cult before their final night at the Isle Tide Hotel. Save Eleanor Malone in this eccentric live-action mystery, where every decision affects the story. WHO PRESSED MUTE ON UNCLE MARCUS? An eccentric FMV murder mystery with a twist: someone has poisoned Uncle Marcus. Uncover the truth in the yearly family quiz and try to save him before it is too late. THE SHAPESHIFTING DETECTIVE The Shapeshifting Detective is a supernatural murder mystery FMV game where you play as a detective who can shapeshift into other characters, allowing you to unlock secret conversations and private encounters. From the makers of "The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker".
Title: FMV Detective

description: Welcome to a new racing bros party adventure that will challenge your skills once more. Try the epic extraction challenge across the world or fight against your friends in crazy party modes. Are you ready for some more racing bros?
Title: RACING BROS: MAFIAS REVENGE

description: In this retro-style arcade game, you have to collect apples that fall from the trees! Get special golden apples to get more lives! Catch apples to keep playing! This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game. If you already own the PS4® version of this game, you can get the PS5® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4® disc copy must insert it into the PS5® every time they want to download or play the PS5® digital version. PS4® game disc owners who buy the PS5® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5® version at no extra cost.
Title: APPLESNATCH!

description: Mother's Day Journey is a delightful puzzle game designed to celebrate the enchanting atmosphere of Mother's Day. Flip Mother's Day themed cards to uncover matching pairs. The game offers four different difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert. Each level challenges players' memory and attention skills while immersing them in the joyous holiday spirit with adorable Mother's Day characters and atmospheric music. Mother's Day Journey, with its four distinct difficulty levels, adds an extra layer of joy to your Mother's Day celebrations!
Title: Mother's Day Journey
Publisher: ERIK GAMES YAZILIM OYUN TEKNOLOJILERI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

description: Dive into the heart of the Summer Games Tournament with this Beach Volley game Experience the thrill of competition as you vie for the coveted gold medal in intense beach volleyball matches. Our game delivers a true-to-life experience with full 3D graphics, smooth animations, and realistic beach volleyball sound effects, ensuring every spike and dive feels authentic and immersive. Compete solo against AI challengers or gather your friends for exhilarating local multiplayer matches for up to 4 players. Whether you're serving up aces or executing precise blocks, every move counts as you strive to dominate the sandy court and claim victory. "Summer Games Beach Volley" is the perfect blend of excitement and precision, offering players a chance to showcase their skills in the ultimate test of beach volleyball prowess. Are you ready to step onto the sand, face off against the competition, and seize the gold medal in the Summer Games Tournament?
Title: Summer Games Beach Volley
Publisher: Benoit Varasse trading as Pix Arts

Our game delivers a true-to-life experience with full 3D graphics, smooth animations, and realistic beach volleyball sound effects, ensuring every spike and dive feels authentic and immersive. Compete solo against AI challengers or gather your friends for exhilarating local multiplayer matches for up to 4 players. Whether you're serving up aces or executing precise blocks, every move counts as you strive to dominate the sandy court and claim victory. "Summer Games Beach Volley" is the perfect blend of excitement and precision, offering players a chance to showcase their skills in the ultimate test of beach volleyball prowess. description: Dive into the action by navigating a vibrant, stylized main menu and jump straight into single-player mode. Choose from unique tracks set in 4 breathtaking environments. Customize your ride by selecting from a variety of motorcycles, each with its own unique design and stats to match your playstyle. Upon crossing the finish line, check out your performance on the results screen, highlighting any new records. Feel the satisfaction of progress and the excitement of new challenges. Offroad Masters: Motocross Races delivers an immersive, exhilarating racing experience that will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to become the ultimate Offroad Master?
Title: Offroad Masters: Motocross Races
Publisher: Revulo Games sp. z o. o.

description: Dive into the action by navigating a vibrant, stylized main menu and jump straight into single-player mode. Choose from unique tracks set in 4 breathtaking environments. Customize your ride by selecting from a variety of motorcycles, each with its own unique design and stats to match your playstyle. Upon crossing the finish line, check out your performance on the results screen, highlighting any new records. Feel the satisfaction of progress and the excitement of new challenges. Offroad Masters: Motocross Races delivers an immersive, exhilarating racing experience that will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to become the ultimate Offroad Master?
Title: Offroad Masters: Motocross Races
Publisher: Revulo Games sp. z o. o.

description: In this retro-style arcade game, you have to shoot the monsters to gather colored spheres! Get three of the same color in a row to get a weapon upgrade! Upgrade all three colors to win! This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game. If you already own the PS4® version of this game, you can get the PS5® digital version at no extra cost and you do not need to purchase this product. Owners of a PS4® disc copy must insert it into the PS5® every time they want to download or play the PS5® digital version. PS4® game disc owners who buy the PS5® Digital Edition disc-free console will not be able to get the PS5® version at no extra cost.
Title: Overdrive Blaster

description: Dive into a world where ancient evils clash in an epic struggle for supremacy. "Dracula VS Monsters" thrusts players into a dark and twisted realm where the legendary vampire lord faces off against a relentless onslaught of nightmarish creatures. Embark on a journey through hauntingly beautiful landscapes rendered in stunning pixel art, where every shadow conceals a new threat and every step could be your last. In this pulse-pounding action-adventure, survival is not just a goal—it's a desperate race against time. As players progress through the game's perilous levels, they must harness their wits and strength to overcome increasingly ferocious adversaries. But beware, for the deeper you delve into the darkness, the more powerful and cunning your enemies become. With its dynamic combat system and strategic gameplay mechanics, "Dracula VS Monsters" offers an immersive experience that will keep players on the edge of their seats. Will you emerge as the ultimate hunter of the night, or succumb to the insatiable hunger of the undead? The fate of the world hangs in the balance, and only the bravest souls dare to face the darkness head-on.
Title: Dracula VS Monsters

description: Do you like Pac-Man? Can you handle this version of the game? Pac-man in 1 dimension, can you collect all the coins and escape from the ghost? Your goal is to collect as many coins as possible without getting caught by the ghost. The score will multiply each time you collect all the coins. You can eat a special coin that will allow you to eat the ghost and earn extra points.
Title: PAKU PAKU

description: Defend the city against attacking Bomber Aircrafts. Don't let any bombs reach the ground!
Title: Cazzarion: Bomber Attack

description: Find different cats and return them to their previous catgirls view. Try to create your own strategy for game. Explore this game! Lovely crush will help you to relax from reality. - 45 levels of relaxed puzzle match game - 5 amazing animated catgirls - 30 awesome art catgirls - relaxing music - 2D animation performance
Title: Lovely Crush

description: Moving Out 2 is the wacky sequel to the world-famous physics-based moving simulator. Working as a solo F.A.R.T, or with up to three friends, slip into your Smooth Moves uniform and help the residents of Packmore, and beyond, to pack up and ship out! The F.A.R.Tastic 4 pack add's 4 keen new movers into the Smooth Moves roster, allowing you to flex those moving muscles with Chum, Bastian, Hootacris and Cera Topps across the all new Packmore and beyond. MULTI-DIMENSIONAL LOCAL & ONLINE MULTIPLAYER Friends who move together, groove together! Whether you fancy some local co-op action or a cross-play online multiplayer session, we’ve got you signed, sealed and delivered! NEW ADVENTURE We’re not in Packmore anymore… Via inter-dimensional portals you will explore new worlds filled with hilariously silly challenges and chaotic, rib-tickling action. FRESH CHARACTERS & RETURNING FAVOURITES Moving Out 2 features an entire new cast of extra lovable characters because Smooth Moves have signed up some new F.A.R.T recruits! Not to worry though, Rye Yu and Sidney are still on the payroll… IT'S FOR EVERYONE! Assist mode?! Check! A wide array of accessibility options?! Check! Loads of characters and countless finely tailored fits and skins for all you fashionistas?! Check! Check! Check!
Title: Moving Out 2 - Deluxe Edition

description: Welcome to Auto Empire: Dealer Car Simulator, the ultimate 3D car dealership experience! Step into the shoes of a savvy car dealer and build your empire from the ground up. Buy old, run-down vehicles, give them a new lease on life with your repair skills, and sell them for a profit. With each successful sale, you’ll have the opportunity to upgrade your dealership, expand your empire, and become the top car dealer in town. Key Features: Realistic Car Trading: Purchase a variety of old cars, each with unique conditions and challenges. Assess the best deals and make strategic decisions to maximize your profits. Detailed Repair Mechanics: Dive into the intricacies of car repair. Replace parts, fix engines, and give each car a fresh look with your expert touch. Upgrade Your Dealership: Use your earnings to expand and upgrade your dealership. Enhance your showroom, hire skilled staff, and attract more customers to grow your business. Dynamic Economy: Experience a realistic market where prices fluctuate. Keep an eye on trends and adjust your buying and selling strategies accordingly. Customization Options: Personalize your cars with a variety of upgrades and visual modifications to increase their value and appeal to potential buyers. Immersive 3D Graphics: Enjoy stunning 3D graphics that bring the world of car dealing to life. From detailed car models to a bustling dealership environment, every aspect is designed for immersion. Engaging Gameplay: Balance your time and resources as you juggle buying, repairing, and selling cars. Strategic planning and quick thinking are key to building a successful empire. Are you ready to turn rusty old cars into gold and build the car dealership empire of your dreams? Jump into Auto Empire: Dealer Car Simulator and start your journey today!
Title: Auto Empire: Dealer Car Simulator

description: Dive into the heart-pounding action of "Air Sea Modern Conflict," an exhilarating game where you take direct control of powerful ships and aircraft to annihilate waves of relentless enemies. As a skilled commander, you'll pilot various naval vessels, from agile destroyers and stealthy submarines to massive aircraft carriers, each armed with an array of devastating weapons. Take to the skies with an impressive selection of aircraft, including nimble fighters, heavy bombers, drones and versatile helicopters, to dominate both land and sea. In this fast-paced combat experience, you'll face relentless waves of enemies across diverse environments, from stormy seas to sunlit skies. Engage in high-octane battles, dodging enemy fire, launching counterattacks, and coordinating strikes between your naval and air units. Master the unique controls and capabilities of each vehicle to outmanoeuvre and outgun your adversaries. Enhance your fleet and arsenal through the in-game shop, where you can use currency earned by destroying enemies to buy new ships, aircraft, and weapons. Collect currency from fallen foes to expand and upgrade your combat options, ensuring you remain a formidable force on the battlefield. With cutting-edge graphics, realistic sound effects, and adrenaline-fueled gameplay, "Air Sea Modern Conflict" offers an immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Prepare for a relentless fight for supremacy as you unleash your arsenal in this epic modern warfare adventure.
Title: Air Sea Modern Conflict
Publisher: Benoit Varasse trading as Pix Arts

description: Dive into the heart-pounding action of "Air Sea Modern Conflict," an exhilarating game where you take direct control of powerful ships and aircraft to annihilate waves of relentless enemies. As a skilled commander, you'll pilot various naval vessels, from agile destroyers and stealthy submarines to massive aircraft carriers, each armed with an array of devastating weapons. Take to the skies with an impressive selection of aircraft, including nimble fighters, heavy bombers, drones and versatile helicopters, to dominate both land and sea. In this fast-paced combat experience, you'll face relentless waves of enemies across diverse environments, from stormy seas to sunlit skies. Engage in high-octane battles, dodging enemy fire, launching counterattacks, and coordinating strikes between your naval and air units. Master the unique controls and capabilities of each vehicle to outmanoeuvre and outgun your adversaries. Enhance your fleet and arsenal through the in-game shop, where you can use currency earned by destroying enemies to buy new ships, aircraft, and weapons. Collect currency from fallen foes to expand and upgrade your combat options, ensuring you remain a formidable force on the battlefield. With cutting-edge graphics, realistic sound effects, and adrenaline-fueled gameplay, "Air Sea Modern Conflict" offers an immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Prepare for a relentless fight for supremacy as you unleash your arsenal in this epic modern warfare adventure.
Title: Air Sea Modern Conflict
Publisher: Benoit Varasse trading as Pix Arts

description: The king have been taken hostage and locked inside a Dungeon! A dungeon that changes each time you die or complete a level. Complete in challenging different ways to escape, from becoming invisible, turning the world upside down and a lot more - your only goal is to escape without rage quitting.
Title: Kingdom's Dungeon Rage

description: Embark on a journey to build and defend your own medieval kingdom in "Knight Sim Life," a captivating 3D farming and city-building simulation game. Set in a vibrant low-poly world, players assume the role of a valiant knight tasked with cultivating the land, constructing magnificent structures, and safeguarding their burgeoning realm from looming threats. Features: Dynamic City Building: Construct and customize your medieval city from the ground up. Erect majestic castles, bustling markets, quaint cottages, and essential infrastructure to support your growing population. Lavish Farming Mechanics: Delve into the art of agriculture as you cultivate vast fields of crops, orchards, and livestock. Harvest resources, manage livestock, and master the seasons to ensure prosperity for your people. Thriving Economy: Establish trade routes, negotiate with merchants, and manage your kingdom's economy to foster prosperity and growth. Trade resources, goods, and artifacts with neighboring realms to strengthen alliances and expand your influence. Rich Narrative: Immerse yourself in a captivating storyline filled with quests, challenges, and unexpected encounters. Unravel the mysteries of the realm, forge alliances with other knights, and shape the fate of your kingdom through your actions. Immersive Visuals: Experience the charm of a medieval fantasy world brought to life with stunning low-poly graphics, vibrant environments, and intricate details that capture the essence of a bygone era. Endless Exploration: Venture beyond the walls of your city to discover hidden treasures, ancient ruins, and untamed wilderness teeming with adventure. Explore diverse biomes, encounter mythical creatures, and uncover the secrets of the land. "Knight Sim Life" offers a compelling blend of city-building, farming simulation, and strategic combat, inviting players to embark on an epic journey of discovery, conquest, and heroism in a richly detailed medieval world.
Title: Knight Sim Life

description: Cliff Rockslide is a beloved news reporter from Butterfly Valley. And Butterfly Valley is one of those very unremarkable places where nothing happens. Except once you look a bit closer and you see that actually, those are the exact places where everything happens. Local News with Cliff Rockslide is a point-and-shoot interactive story about Cliff Rockslide, Butterfly Valley's epic news, zombies, cults, mysterious cubes, and everything and anything that can happen in a small town. The story is hand-crafted by one of Finland's top comedians and it can be described as country-side comedy. Your mission in the game is to shoot all the action to your camera as the freshly-hired cameraperson of Cliff. Follow the intense (and nonsense) action, point your cam, and shoot those shots. • First-person view of the story through your camera's lens • A perfect mix of point-and-click, visual novel, and FPS • Complete minigames, accomplish challenges and solve puzzles
Title: Local News with Cliff Rockslide

description: Cliff Rockslide is a beloved news reporter from Butterfly Valley. And Butterfly Valley is one of those very unremarkable places where nothing happens. Except once you look a bit closer and you see that actually, those are the exact places where everything happens.
