Title: Local News with Cliff Rockslide

description: Sky Survivors is an arena shooter roguelite. Choose from a variety of skills, unlock unique characters and weapons. Build «stairway to heaven» — a sky tower, each floor of which gives your character a unique bonus. Create your own overpowered build to survive against hordes of monsters! Features: ■ Auto-aim mode. ■ Over 100 different skills to choose from. ■ «Stairway to Heaven» — each floor has its own unique bonuses. ■ Unique weapons that completely change your playstyle. ■ Diverse characters with unique abilities. ■ Multiple game modes allow you to choose the playstyle to your liking.
Title: Sky Survivors

description: Based on the popular anime & manga series! Anya Forger has received a new assignment from school: create a photo diary of memories. On weekdays, head to class in the morning, then enjoy family time in the evening. On weekends, visit all sorts of exciting places, like the beach or art museums, in search of subjects worthy of photographing! What kind of photo diary will you help Anya create? • Take pictures when Anya finds something interesting! • There are many peculiar things that can catch Anya's attention, like butterflies, swings, and fun sights during outings! Take great photos to complete her diary. • There are a total of 10 outings to unique destinations for making memories! SPY×ANYA also features over 15 minigames! Enjoy over 15 minigames, including ones inspired by the anime series and those created originally for the game! Fight to stay in sync with Yor's special training, ride Bond as you play spy, and use Anya's telepathic powers to read opponents' cards in Tycoon. Bring out your inner fashionista with rich customization! Have fun dressing up Anya, Loid, Yor, and Bond in a wardrobe of over 80 unique outfits, accessories, and hairstyles! Purchase outfits from the in-game store with points earned from minigames. Play to your heart's content and unlock all kinds of clothes to wear on outings! Spend time with your favorite characters based on the manga series! In addition to Anya, Loid, Yor, and Bond; Damian and Becky from Eden College will also join the fun—not to mention Yor's brother, Yuri, and WISE agent Nightfall! Play at school together, get help with homework, and create countless precious memories with Anya's friends and family.
Title: SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories

description: On the anniversary of the Jupiter disaster, an alien signal transmits construction blueprints for an alien craft, which humanity builds, called Exo One. An alien craft… Master a truly alien traversal system and move through enigmatic and desolate alien landscapes in ways you've never experienced. Control gravity itself and build momentum to reach colossal speeds and exhilarating heights. An interplanetary journey Ride thermal updrafts into boiling cloud formations, careen down hillsides and launch off mountain tops, all the time drifting toward the shining blue beam on the horizon. Atmospheric, diffused visuals are merged with otherworldly sound effects and a hypnotic electric guitar soundtrack. Pilot your craft on mankind's first voyage outside the solar system, and go on an interplanetary journey across space and time.
Title: Exo One

description: Take to the skies in "Drone Delivery Simulator," a thrilling single-player game where you start as a humble pizza delivery pilot and rise to master a variety of complex delivery missions. Navigate a detailed map with your evolving drone fleet, facing diverse challenges and environments. Key Features: - Progressive Delivery Missions: Start with pizza deliveries and unlock more advanced tasks. - Single Expansive Map: Explore different areas, from urban landscapes to suburban settings. - Customizable Drone Fleet: Upgrade from basic models to advanced drones for varied missions. - Realistic Controls and Physics: Master skillful flying in changing weather and environments. - Strategic Gameplay: Plan efficient routes to meet diverse delivery deadlines. - Continuous Challenge: Adapt to increasing difficulty and varied package requirements. Embark on a unique drone delivery adventure and transform your piloting skills into a flourishing delivery service.
Title: Drone Delivery Simulator

description: Embark on a thrilling adventure with our exhilarating game where you take control of a mighty Raptor with just the press of a button. Are you ready to unleash your inner beast and dominate the prehistoric world? Get ready for non-stop action and excitement with our Raptor feeding frenzy game!
Title: Feed My Raptor

description: Welcome to City Bus Simulator, the ultimate 3D bus simulation game that puts you in the driver's seat of a city bus! Experience the thrill of navigating the bustling streets, completing challenging missions, and becoming the best bus driver in the city. Immerse Yourself in Realistic Bus Driving City Bus Simulator offers a highly realistic driving experience with meticulously detailed 3D graphics that bring the city to life. Feel the rush of driving through busy urban streets, dealing with traffic, and maneuvering through tight spots. With dynamic weather conditions and a day-night cycle, every drive is a new adventure. Diverse and Engaging Missions Take on a variety of exciting missions that test your driving and time management skills. Whether you're parking with precision, transporting passengers from one location to another, or meeting tight deadlines, each mission offers a unique challenge. Your goal is to complete these missions successfully to earn money and unlock new opportunities. Earn Money and Upgrade Your Fleet Every successful mission rewards you with money that you can use to upgrade your bus fleet. Buy more powerful and faster buses, each with unique designs and capabilities. From standard city buses to luxury coaches, choose the right bus for the mission at hand and enhance your driving experience. Key Features: Realistic Bus Driving Experience: Drive through beautifully designed cityscapes with realistic traffic patterns and pedestrian interactions. Wide Range of Missions: Enjoy a variety of mission types including parking challenges, passenger transportation, and time-based tasks. Dynamic Weather and Day-Night Cycle: Experience changing weather conditions and a realistic day-night cycle that affects your driving conditions. Bus Upgrades and Customization: Use your earnings to purchase and upgrade buses. Customize your buses to improve performance and style. Intuitive Controls: Easy-to-use controls provide a smooth driving experience for players of all skill levels. Immersive 3D Graphics: High-quality 3D graphics create an immersive and visually stunning world. Realistic Sounds and Effects: Authentic bus sounds and environmental effects enhance the realism of the game. Who Can Play? City Bus Simulator is designed for simulation game enthusiasts, driving fans, and anyone who loves a good challenge. It's suitable for players of all ages, offering an enjoyable and educational experience for younger players and a satisfying challenge for adults.
Title: City Bus Simulator

description: Step into the shadowy world of high-stakes theft with "Thief Simulator: Heist Master," a cutting-edge 3D simulator that puts you in the shoes of a master thief. Plan and execute the perfect heist as you steal vehicles, crack safes, and make away with valuable treasures. In this immersive experience, every heist is a thrilling puzzle waiting to be solved. Use your ill-gotten gains to purchase advanced tools and gadgets, enhancing your skills and unlocking new, more lucrative targets. With each successful job, you'll inch closer to becoming the ultimate heist master. Key Features: Realistic 3D Environments: Navigate through beautifully rendered environments that react to your every move. Advanced Heist Mechanics: Utilize a variety of tools and techniques to disable security systems, crack safes, and bypass locks. Dynamic Vehicle Theft: Steal an array of vehicles, from everyday cars to high-end supercars, each with their own unique challenges. Progressive Skill Development: Invest your earnings in new equipment and upgrades, enhancing your abilities and opening up new opportunities. Engaging Gameplay: Combine stealth, strategy, and quick thinking to outsmart security measures and complete increasingly complex heists. Are you ready to embrace the life of a master thief? Hone your skills, gather your gear, and step into the thrilling world of "Thief Simulator: Heist Master" today!
Title: Thief Simulator: Heist Master

description: This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game. A Pioneering Action-Adventure Game Armed with her precious daï-jo fighting stick and faithful camera, Jade’s adventure will get you to freely explore Hillys, combat creatures large and small, infiltrate dangerous areas, solve enigmatic puzzles, play addictive mini-games, race the best hovercraft pilots, and take pictures of the whole experience. Rediscover the Award-Winning Adventure Swoop into the marvelous world of Hillys as action-reporter Jade to investigate the mysterious DomZ alien attacks alongside colorful characters, like her adoptive uncle Pey’j or the valiant Double H. On the Hunt for Treasure Enjoy exclusive new rewards as you explore the planet and discover more about Jade’s past in a new treasure hunt throughout Hillys. Dive into History Put your skills to the test thanks to the new speedrun mode and updated achievements, and learn more about the game’s development and secrets in the anniversary gallery! The Best Way to Play Embark on this epic adventure in up to 4K 60 fps with improved graphics and controls, along with updated audio and remastered soundtrack, and new quality-of-life features including autosave, cross-save, and cutscene-skip. Be ready to experience a trailblazing blend of action gameplay and thrilling emotional cutscenes! Internet connection, Ubisoft Account and PlayStation™Network account required to access online features.
Title: Beyond Good & Evil 20th Anniversary Edition

description: Embark on a high-octane, adrenaline-fueled adventure in Cyberpunk Parkour Uprising, a thrilling 3D game that merges the electrifying art of parkour with a dystopian cyberpunk world. Players are thrust into a sprawling urban landscape where freedom comes at a cost and agility is the ultimate weapon. Key Features: Dynamic Parkour Gameplay: Master the art of movement and freedom with seamless parkour mechanics. Run, jump, climb, and slide through futuristic cityscapes filled with obstacles and challenges. Choose Your Champion: Select from a diverse roster of characters, each with their own unique skills and abilities. Whether you prefer speed, agility, or strength, there's a character to suit every play style. Immersive Cyberpunk World: Explore a vividly realized cyberpunk universe, where neon-lit skyscrapers and dark alleyways create the backdrop for an uprising against oppressive forces. Customization and Progression: Unlock new characters, abilities, and customization options as you progress. Build your character to suit your preferred play style and dominate the cityscape. Synopsis: In a world where the city is a playground and the only way up is to defy gravity, Cyberpunk Parkour Uprising pits players against the forces of oppression in a fight for freedom. Are you ready to rise above and become the ultimate parkour champion?
Title: Cyberpunk Parkour Uprising

description: Destroy Ships in the sea with a Ship Hunter Airplane
Title: Cazzarion: Ship Hunting

description: Get ready for a heart-pounding, action-packed zombie shooting game set in a Brazilian favela. In "Favela Zombie Shooter," you'll face wave after wave of different zombies and have to survive as long as you can. Gameplay: Wave-Based Survival: Brace yourself for relentless waves of the living dead. You must stand your ground and fight off waves of zombies, each with their own unique behaviors and abilities. Zombie Types: To survive, you'll need to adapt to the different zombie types. Slow-moving zombies lumber towards you, but their sheer numbers can overwhelm. Runners sprint at breakneck speed, making them difficult targets. Scratchers, when close, they attack quickly and inflict serious damage. Heavy zombies are nearly impervious to gunfire and require tactical thinking to bring down. Upgrade System: To stay alive, you'll need better weapons. You can earn money in the game and use it to buy stronger guns to help you survive. Features: - Fun and intense zombie shooting action. - Different types of zombies to fight. - Buy better weapons to survive longer. - Four different maps to survive in. - Realistic graphics and beautiful environments. In "Favela Zombie Shooter," you'll need quick reflexes and powerful weapons to survive the zombie onslaught. Can you make it out alive from the favela filled with zombies?
Title: Favela Zombie Shooter

description: Embark on an epic odyssey to safeguard the future of humanity in "Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare" As the valiant Sergeant Eric, you're entrusted with leading your elite team through 60 harrowing days of relentless warfare against an onslaught of enemies threatening mankind's existence on the Red Planet. In "Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare," the fate of civilization lies in your hands as you navigate a treacherous landscape teeming with danger. Choose wisely from a vast array of customizable suits, each offering unique levels of protection crucial for surviving the relentless barrage of enemy attacks. Arm yourself with a formidable arsenal of 8 powerful weapons, meticulously crafted and upgradeable, to unleash devastation upon your foes and ensure victory in the face of overwhelming odds. But survival on Mars demands more than just brute force—it requires strategic ingenuity and cunning tactics. Employ your tactical prowess to strategically position mines and explosive barrels across the Martian terrain, turning the very environment against your adversaries and paving the way for triumph against insurmountable odds. Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring realism of "Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare" where cutting-edge graphics transport you to the desolate beauty of the Martian frontier. Every pulse-pounding moment is a testament to your courage and resilience as you forge alliances with skilled allies and engage in heart-stopping battles to secure humanity's future among the stars. Prepare to embark on the ultimate journey of survival and conquest in "Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare" The fate of humanity hangs in the balance, and only you have the power to ensure that mankind's legacy endures on the crimson sands of Mars.
Title: Mars Mayhem:Shooter Simulator Warfare

description: Fight In Ever Changing Space Battles! Run through the universe, discover the numerous perks/consumables and their synergistic effects. Explore the randomly-generated galaxy to find merchants, unlock spacecrafts, collect StellarNetES Cartridges, checkmark your kills of the various galactic overlords. And die. A lot! Can you find the most outrageous perk combination to defeat the Last Overlord? Core Features: - Rogue-like Elements: With a randomly generated universe and randomized perks, no journey will ever be the same! What will happen to you, in your own unique apocalyptic cataclysmic transgalactic voyage? - Synergistic Perk System: Over 100 perks and consumables! Look out for the synergistic nature of the perks that suits your playstyle! - Galactic Bounties: Complete over 100 missions to participate in the StellarNET Entertainment System lottery! - Customize Your Start: Choose your spacecraft: there is one for every playstyle, as they have unique starting perks. You can personalize your arsenal from numerous weapons: cannons, missiles and lasers! - Unlock Spacecrafts, View Your Progress: Check out what have you accomplished in our in-game encyclopedia StellarNET. Unlock new spacecrafts, and kill all the bosses to progress in StellarNET's kill table. Check which perks and consumables you have used and seen, and what is your progress towards the achievements! - Explore the Universe: Some levels are more special than others: Merchants, Bosses, Spacecraft Factories. Fight through lower-difficulty levels to stock up on perks, or just streamline to the end-boss if you feel powerful enough!
Title: Stellar Interface

description: Fight In Ever Changing Space Battles! Run through the universe, discover the numerous perks/consumables and their synergistic effects. Explore the randomly-generated galaxy to find merchants, unlock spacecrafts, collect StellarNetES Cartridges, checkmark your kills of the various galactic overlords. And die. A lot! Can you find the most outrageous perk combination to defeat the Last Overlord? description: The Ouroboros King combines the strategic depth of chess with the build variety and replayability of roguelikes. Assemble a formidable army, discover powerful relics, and buy surprising gadgets to defeat the Coven. Core Gameplay • Build the Ultimate Army: Combine classic and new fairy chess pieces, relics that give them bonuses, and consumable items that grant you temporary advantages to create a formidable army. • Perfect Your Strategy: You can only move one piece per turn, so you must choose carefully. Make your troops work together to obliterate the enemy army. • Another Chance: If you're defeated you can go back to action on another timeline, where the path to victory will change: different map, different enemies, different rewards... in true roguelike spirit. Other Features • Lots of end-game options to dial up the difficulty to insane levels. • Same-device multiplayer, challenge your friends to chess games with lots of unique pieces. • Chess-based tactics, easy to learn and hard to master. • 15-45 minute runs, good for a short break and also longer sessions. • No gatekeeping, all the content is unlocked from the start. Win or die based on your skills. • No need to learn any chess openings or study anything.
Title: The Ouroboros King

description: The Ouroboros King combines the strategic depth of chess with the build variety and replayability of roguelikes. Assemble a formidable army, discover powerful relics, and buy surprising gadgets to defeat the Coven. Win or die based on your skills. • No need to learn any chess openings or study anything.
Title: The Ouroboros King

description: Discover the exciting world of Primal Survivors! Are you prepared for the craziest adventure of all time? Meet Primal Survivors, a survival game filled with unique and bizarre creatures! ◘ 50 Skill Sets: Each campaign is a unique experience! With 50 skill sets represented by exclusive cards, you'll have endless possibilities to face the challenges that arise. ◘ 25 Permanent Upgrades: Unlock and enhance your character over time! With 25 permanent upgrades available, you'll become more powerful with every step. ◘ 12 Classes: Choose from 12 distinct classes, each with its own abilities and playstyle. Discover which one fits your style best and conquer survival! ◘ 12 Weapons: Armed to the teeth! Primal Survivors offers an impressive variety of 12 weapons for you to master and eliminate the threats that stand in your way. ◘ 3 Bosses with Unique Behaviors: Overcome epic challenges by facing 3 powerful bosses, each with exclusive behaviors and tactics. Thrills guaranteed! ◘ 10-Minute Bonfire Gameplay Mode: Even with a busy schedule, you can still enjoy the adrenaline of Primal Survivors! The "Bonfire" mode offers 10-minute sessions, perfect for busy players. ◘ 2 Special Game Modes: Unlock 2 special game modes, featuring unique classes and weapons for an even more diverse experience. Primal Survivors is much more than just a game; it's an unforgettable journey to the heart of survival. Venture forth now and discover what you're capable of!
Title: Primal Survivors

description: Beneath The Earth - Backrooms is a horror game! you're left alone and lost, wandering the seemingly infinite maze of hallways, otherwise known as the Backrooms. Might there be something following you?, solving different puzzles with different mechanics in each one. This game is based on the famous horrifying Internet folklore genre of cursed dreams with many real references implemented such as iconic entities and important elements. Explore the seemingly infinite expanse of eerily familiar levels in the backrooms.
Title: Beneath the earth - Backrooms

description: Tired of the hustle and bustle? Take a tour to Love Island! Play this match-three game with RPG elements to seduce all those charming anime girls! Warm sea and tropical heat. Exotic cocktails and beach massages. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of relaxation and fun as you spend an unforgettable vacation on Love Island. Find your way into the hearts of 5 beauties and unlock over 10 beautifully animated CG scenes.
Title: Love Island

description: Get ready to put your parking skills to the ultimate test in Police Car Parking 3D! This thrilling 3D parking simulation game lets you step into the shoes of a police officer tasked with parking a variety of police cars in challenging scenarios. Navigate through increasingly difficult levels, each designed to test your precision and timing. Gameplay Overview: In Police Car Parking 3D, players must expertly maneuver police cars into designated parking spots within a set time limit. Each level presents unique obstacles and tighter spaces, pushing your driving skills to the limit. As you progress and successfully complete levels, you'll earn money based on your performance. Key Features: Realistic 3D Environments: Experience detailed and immersive parking scenarios with realistic graphics. Progressive Difficulty: Levels become more challenging as you advance, requiring more precision and skill. Earn and Upgrade: Earn money with each completed level and use your earnings to purchase better, faster, and more agile police cars. Variety of Vehicles: Unlock and drive a range of police vehicles, each with unique handling characteristics. Intuitive Controls: Enjoy easy-to-learn controls that offer a realistic driving experience. Story/Setting: Take on the role of a dedicated police officer assigned to park various police vehicles in complex urban environments. Each level simulates different parts of the city, from crowded streets to narrow alleys, ensuring that every parking task is a new adventure. Unique Selling Points: Challenging Gameplay: A game that keeps you engaged with progressively challenging levels. Realistic Simulation: High-quality 3D graphics and realistic physics make for an immersive parking experience. Vehicle Customization: Use your hard-earned money to upgrade your fleet of police cars, enhancing both performance and appearance. Inspiration: Inspired by classic parking simulation games, Police Car Parking 3D brings a unique twist by incorporating the excitement and responsibility of handling police vehicles. Fans of simulation and driving games will find endless hours of fun and challenge.
Title: Police Car Parking 3D

description: Begin your journey and experience the unparalleled storytelling and lore of The Elder Scrolls. Explore Tamriel—a massive living universe where your choices shape your adventure. Go it solo or with friends and allies as you explore, quest, craft, and roleplay in a world where you can customize your abilities and gear to suit any playstyle. No game subscription required—buy once, play anytime. COLLECTION The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Gold Road is ideal for adventurers, who wish to access all major Chapter zones and quests found across Tamriel. The Collection: Gold Road includes the Gold Road Chapter in addition to the base game AND all previous Chapters. CREATE YOUR OWN LEGEND—With seven classes, ten distinct races, and a host of skill lines and abilities, you can forge a character that is uniquely you. Battle deadly foes, craft and modify your gear and items, customize your home away from home, and play your way. EXPLORE A LIVING OPEN WORLD—Venture into varied regions such as the snowy peaks of Skyrim, the mushroom forests of Morrowind, and the dragon-scorched desert of Elsweyr. The path you tread is entirely up to you. IMMERSE YOURSELF IN MEMORABLE STORIES—Discover unforgettable tales and characters throughout the world of Tamriel and beyond. Encounter Daedric Princes, would-be emperors, and those that simply call Nirn home. Experience stories both epic and intimate alone, with friends, or with your allies and companions. INCLUDES LATEST CHAPTER: GOLD ROAD—A forgotten Daedric Prince has returned, bringing chaos to West Weald! Defend the city of Skingrad, first encountered in TES IV: Oblivion, now beset by a dangerous Daedric cult and the encroaching Valenwood. Customize your skills like never before with the all-new Scribing system.
genre: Role Playing Games, Role Playing Games
Title: The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Gold Road

description: Save by purchasing this bundle including Synth Riders and the latest DLC to the game! - If you already own Synth Riders, go directly to the 80s Mixtape - Side A to add the songs to your library! 80s Mixtape - Side A brings together some of our favorites from a time where the only things bigger than the hair were the hits! We built this sensational compilation on five original chart-toppers from the New Wave decade which is such an inspiration for the neon immersive worlds of Synth Riders. 80s Mixtape - Side A Track List: “Take on Me” - a-ha “We Built this City” - Starship “Whip It” - Devo “Sussudio” - Phil Collins “New Sensation” - INXS a-ha, Devo, Phil Collins, Starship and INXS. Get ready to sing and dance to these songs, immersed for the first time in the ‘80s vibe of Synth Riders’ retrofuture environments!
Title: Synth Riders + 80s Mixtape - Side A

description: Dive into a Dadaist journey, unraveling nature and technology mysteries in 36 captivating levels. "Gallery of Things: Reveries" is a unique hidden object game deeply influenced by the whimsical and thought-provoking Dadaism art movement. Spanning 36 levels, each stage is meticulously crafted to be a visual and intellectual challenge. Players are immersed in montages that blend the surreal with the familiar, urging a deeper contemplation of the interplay between humans, nature, and technology. This game is more than just a search-and-find challenge; it's an artistic journey that captivates the mind and stirs the soul.
Title: Gallery Of Things: Reveries

description: I Love Finding Cats and Pups is a classic hidden object game set in beautiful scenes. Search through them all to adopt and collect all the pawsome cats and pups! Play new mini games, solve fun puzzles, and collect all the adorable cats and pups! - Find a great variety of cats and pups! - Explore beautiful hidden object locations. - Collector's Edition includes 6 extra locations - Collector's Edition includes 12 more minigames - Meet the developers’ cats and pups!
Title: I Love Finding Cats & Pups Collector's Edition

description: Play So Much Stuff 3: Odds & Ends and dive into a delightful journey of sorting through an array of beautiful themes, clearing out a multitude of items and trinkets. In this new set of beautifully created hidden object scenes, you will sort through unique odds & ends! Feel the satisfaction of organizing and decluttering! Sort through fun and interesting new themes and play a whole new set of mini-games! - Play over 100 games! - Make gameplay simpler with Help and Hint functions! - Collector's Edition includes 8 extra themes - Collector's Edition includes 1 more collection room
Title: So Much Stuff 3: Odds & Ends Collector's Edition

description: Football 2024 Journey is an engaging card-matching game centered around the exciting world of football. Flip football-themed cards to find matching pairs. The game features four difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert. Each level provides a unique challenge, testing players' memory and concentration. Football 2024 Journey, with its diverse difficulty settings, adds an extra layer of fun to your football-themed gaming experience!
Title: Football 2024 Journey
Publisher: ERIK GAMES YAZILIM OYUN TEKNOLOJILERI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

description: The explosive fusion of streetball, racing and rooftop jumping! Jump on the trampolines to feel the real speed and overtake all your opponents. Find the fastest way to the finish line and show off your best dunk!
Title: Sky Dunk

description: The explosive fusion of streetball, racing and rooftop jumping! Jump on the trampolines to feel the real speed and overtake all your opponents. Find the fastest way to the finish line and show off your best dunk!
Title: Sky Dunk

description: Unleash the commander within in Warfront Tactics - Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator, a captivating physics-based strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of epic warfare. Strategically allocate your resources, craft a formidable army, and outmaneuver your opponents in intense battles governed by realistic physics. Witness the chaos and spectacle of combat as your meticulously planned strategies unfold on the battlefield. Every decision carries weight, every encounter presents a challenge, and every victory is hard-won. Features: - Strategic Depth: Craft cunning tactics and deploy your forces with precision to overcome formidable adversaries. Limited resources demand careful planning, ensuring every decision has a consequence. - Realistic Physics: Witness the raw power of war as realistic physics bring battles to life. Troops collide, formations crumble, and projectiles hurtle through the air in a dynamic and immersive simulation of combat. - Diverse Challenges: From defending against relentless waves of enemies to launching decisive offensives, conquer a multitude of scenarios that demand unique strategic approaches. - Dynamic Battlefields: Immerse yourself in the heart of the action as battles unfold in real-time. Adapt to the ever-shifting tides of combat, exploit opportunities, and lead your troops to glorious victory. - Unmatched Customization: Experiment with a vast array of units, formations, and strategies to personalize your army and discover the tactics that dominate the battlefield. No two battles are ever the same. Are you ready to claim your place as a legendary commander?
Title: Warfront Tactics: Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator

description: Fly to extraordinary planets with different terrains and start mining valuable minerals to sell them in your base. Create corridors to reach stacks of crystals, or do it your own way and mine wherever you like with the help of dynamites. Hire workers and build an auto-miner machine to speed up your work! Over time, mining gets more difficult because of more challenging terrains. Collect money to buy various upgrades for your mining machine, workers, vacuum gun, your character and the backpack you are carrying. This way you will be well prepared and get all the minerals out much faster! Features: - fly to 12 bonus levels with moons on which you will find great cash rewards that will help you buy upgrades much earlier! - explore 12 bonus underground mines where you can find lots of extra gold coins to spend on power-ups or skins - unlock 4 new vehicles you can ride on - travel through multiple unknown and mysterious planets - mine valuable crystals from various terrains using your vacuum gun - sell the collected crystals in your base to earn a lot of money - play in co-op mode for up to 2 players and share the duties! - spend your money to buy different upgrades: capacity, force, speed, workers, mining speed and storage of your auto-miner machine - if you have difficulty mining, use power-ups or blow up the area with dynamite! - teleport to the underground to find gold coins or complete missions to get them - visit the moon and see what rewards await you there - spend your coins to unlock awesome skins and hoverboard vehicle - find fossils of various amazing creatures that once inhabited the planets - bring these creatures back to life, ask them to follow you and enjoy the extra bonuses they give you! Use power-ups of increased backpack capacity, a magnet that attracts crystals, or a jetpack which, in addition to increasing the speed of movement, also melts the terrain. However, they are not free. To use them, you must go through the portal located on the planet and teleport yourself to the underground to find gold coins. You can also spend them to buy various character skins, vacuums and even vehicles! Yes, you read that right, because who wouldn't want to ride a hoverboard on an unknown planet? If you don't want to mine alone, invite a friend to play together in co-op mode and share the duties! Pick your favorite skins, hop on the hoverboards and get rich together by selling colorful minerals! Beware, in the terrain you may find the fossils of creatures that once lived on the planet. Thanks to super technology you can bring them back to the world and assign them to follow you giving you various bonuses! Now go! Put on your space suit, discover new planets with their terrains and mine for valuable crystals!
Title: Astro Miner: Complete Edition

description: Embark on a global journey with the game “Guess the Flag!” Test your knowledge of 255 countries, islands and international organizations in 6 addictive modes. Test your memory by matching the flag to the name of a country or play the reverse mode. If you are already an expert in flag knowledge, you can try the mode in which you have to write the name of the country yourself. Feel the thrill of matching locations to a country and, for a change, immerse yourself in the unpredictable random mode that combines all the challenges. Don't forget the daily challenge, in which each attempt reveals a piece of the flag, but you have to be careful, because your 6th attempt is the last one. After that, all you have to do is wait 24 hours. Will you be able to make a series of victories? If you get bored with the mode with lives, you can raise the adrenaline level by choosing the settings of the time game. The game is divided into regions such as World, Europe, Asia, South America, North America, Australia and Oceania. Master all the flags, race against time and become the greatest flag expert. Key Features: 6 game modes: - Match the name - Match the flag - Writing mode - Location mode - Daily challenge - Random mode Two game styles: - Game with Time - Game with lives Regions: World, Europe, Asia, South America, North America, Australia and Oceania
Title: Guess the Flag!
Publisher: SOURCE BYTE SPÓŁKA Z OGRANICZONĄ ODPOWIEDZIALNOŚCIĄ

description: Meow meow meow mes amis! Cats, kittens, kitties and other fuzzballs are hidden all around the Parisian landscape, each waiting to be found! Take a relaxing stroll around Paris – every cat you spot brings its unique splash of colour into the scenery, and finding them all will fill the city with life! Features: - A huge Parisian landscape to find cats on; - Two game modes, one harder than the other; - Special unlockable places… filled with kittens! ^.^ - A relaxing atmosphere that anyone can enjoy!
Title: Hidden Cats in Paris

description: Meow meow meow mes amis! Cats, kittens, kitties and other fuzzballs are hidden all around the Parisian landscape, each waiting to be found! Take a relaxing stroll around Paris – every cat you spot brings its unique splash of colour into the scenery, and finding them all will fill the city with life! Features: - A huge Parisian landscape to find cats on; - Two game modes, one harder than the other; - Special unlockable places… filled with kittens! ^.^ - A relaxing atmosphere that anyone can enjoy!
Title: Hidden Cats in Paris

description: Welcome to the exciting world of "Supermarket Simulation Grocery Empire 3D"! Get ready to step into the shoes of a supermarket manager and control your own network of stores to become the most successful entrepreneur in town! - Exciting Gameplay: Explore a vibrant and lively virtual world where every decision matters. Create and manage your supermarket from scratch, starting with choosing the location and arranging products on shelves, all the way to managing staff and satisfying customers. - Professional Supermarket Manager: Develop smart business strategies to increase profits and expand your retail empire. Wisely choose products on the shelves, adjust prices, and offer attractive promotions to attract and retain customers. - Growth and Expansion: Lead your business to success and build a network of stores throughout the city. Invest in new locations, diversify your product range, and implement innovative services to strengthen your position in the market. - Customization and Optimization: Customize the appearance and functionality of each store according to the preferences and needs of customers. Create a pleasant and efficient shopping atmosphere and ensure that the shopping experience is always flawless. - Competition and Achievements: Compete with other supermarket managers in exciting competitions and climb to the top of the rankings to showcase your entrepreneurial skills. Unlock exclusive achievements and rewards to highlight your success in the world of retail. Get "Supermarket Simulation Grocery Empire 3D" now and embark on an exciting adventure of management and strategy that will captivate you from the very first click! Get ready to become a master of supermarkets and build an unbeatable commercial empire!
Title: Supermarket Simulation Grocery Empire 3D

description: When a power hungry, egotistical witch spreads her dark magic across the land, it is up to one raccoon to stop her! Play as Roxy, an adventurous young cub as she rolls through nine unique worlds in story mode, hoping to put an end to the witch’s dastardly plans! Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic is a retelling of the original 3D platformer, this time told through an energetic and unique pinball format. Break the witch’s wicked curse and conquer her many challenges across a wide variety of pinball tables, from arenas themed around parks and urban streets to casinos and more! Unlock cosmetics for character customization to express your winning style and prove once and for all that you are the true pinball champion! Features: • Roll your way through 28 pinball tables across multiple modes! • Help Roxy collect gems and meet a variety of objectives to clear each stage. • Trigger gimmicks themed for each level, such as slot machines in the casino! • Take a break from story mode with 30 arcade mini games. • Unlock cosmetic items to give Roxy a personalized look! This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game.
Title: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic

description: This is an emulation of the classic PS2 action-adventure title, Tomb Raider: Legend, playable on PS4 and PS5 for the first time. Follow Lara Croft down a path of discovery as she travels the globe to remote, exotic locales in search of one of history's greatest artifacts that unleashes unwelcome figures from Lara's mysterious past. With guns blazing, Lara must use her athletic ability and intellectual wits to explore vast, treacherous tombs, riddled with challenging puzzles and deadly traps. Experience an adrenaline-fueled adventure in Tomb Raider: Legend!
Title: Tomb Raider: Legend

description: “Shinobi: The Warlord” is set at the end of the tumultuous era known as the Sengoku period in feudal Japan. The story follows the rise and triumph of Tokugawa Ieyasu, a man consumed by his hunger for power. Against the backdrop of chaos and conflict, the consequences of his pursuit of dominance unfold.
Title: Shinobi: The Warlord

description: Enter the lawless world! The Wild West, where revolvers make the law and duels decide fate. In "Cowboy Duel" become a legend and challenge the ruthless world of the Wild West, fighting for fame and fortune. Choose one of the charismatic characters and challenge dangerous criminals in duels where your life is at stake. Epic battles await you in various towns, where each level is a new challenge. Calculate every step, choose the moment to shoot and take cover. Use the environment: hide behind buildings and telegraph poles to avoid enemy bullets. Earn money for duels, improve your weapons and buy more powerful bullets. With each level, the enemies will become stronger, requiring new strategies and better weapons. Travel the Wild West, explore picturesque towns, meet colorful characters and complete challenging missions on each level. Prove your superiority, accept the challenge of the Wild West, where only the bravest and most accurate can become legends. Take part in Cowboy Duel and show that your revolver shoots faster than your shadow!
Title: Cowboy Duel: Red Wild West Massacre

description: Welcome to Grand Prix Racing Universal: where the spirit of rally racing meets the pursuit of Grand Prix glory on a variety of thrilling circuits! Prepare to immerse yourself in the ultimate console racing experience, where every curve, every straightaway, and every overtaking opportunity will test your skills to the limit. Dynamic Racing Action: Strap into high-performance rally cars or rugged pickup and unleash their power on a diverse range of challenging circuits purpose-built for adrenaline-fueled competition. You'll have to compete in 12 vehicules races on 3 levels of difficulty. Single Player or Local Multiplayer: Choose your preferred mode of play and embark on a quest for Grand Prix glory in single-player mode, or challenge a friend in local 2-player mode. With split-screen action, the competition heats up as you both aim for victory on the track. Thrilling Grand Prix Challenges: Compete in a series of exhilarating Grand Prix challenges, each set on a variety of circuits where every race is a thrilling test of skill and strategy. Intense Time Trials: Hone your racing skills and master every corner in intense time trial challenges. Race against the clock as you strive to set new track records and prove yourself as the ultimate speed demon. Garage Customization: Earn coins by winning races and use them to enhance your vehicle in the garage section. From performance upgrades to cosmetic enhancements, fine-tune every aspect of your ride to gain the edge on the competition. Stunning Graphics and Realistic Sound: Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action with stunning graphics that bring each circuit to life in vivid detail. From the roar of the engines to the screech of tires, every sound is meticulously crafted to put you in the driver's seat. Get ready to rev your engines and chase Grand Prix glory in Grand Prix Racing Universal. Are you ready to conquer a variety of thrilling circuits and etch your name in motorsport history?
Title: Grand Prix Racing Universal
Publisher: Benoit Varasse trading as Pix Arts

description: Play 5 different, brain-jogging games, for players of all ages! Take on tons of colorful levels, where the items you need are hidden around, beside, and below many other things! Train your sharp eyes as you look for matching pairs, sets of three, items that satisfy categories like type and color, and more. Then, unscramble beautiful pictures in tile and sliding puzzles. These 5 games from JetDogs’ Shopping Clutter series are sure to surprise and delight! Hop on your favorite sled and slide right into a wintery place where magic prevails! The streets sparkle with bright lights, music resounds all over, and even adults start to believe in miracles again! This year, the Walkers are putting up a magnificent tree. But decorating it is not so easy… Help them find the best ornaments for their Christmas tree, and save the Walkers’ Christmas in Shopping Clutter: Christmas Poetree. Then, just when the Walkers were planning a little trip, Uncle Rat and Auntie Sheep turn up at their door… with tickets for a Christmas cruise! Join the family, travel the world and go ashore to admire the sights. Then, return home to celebrate Christmas in Shopping Clutter: Christmas Cruise. Cap off the winter season with Shopping Clutter: Winter Garden. Uncle Rat wants to set up a greenhouse where his beloved wife Auntie Sheep can grow her flowers all year round. It’s pretty hard to find green plants in winter, but the Walkers are not going to leave Auntie Sheep feeling blue until spring! But, the fall holidays can’t be left out! The Walkers have decided to arrange a feast in Animalville—and, being a real expert on Thanksgiving Day traditions, goodhearted Uncle Tom Turkey came to help. Join the fun in Shopping Clutter: A Perfect Thanksgiving! Finally… love blooms in Shopping Clutter: Love is in the Air! Because Valentine’s Day isn’t just Valentine’s Day… it’s Mr. and Mrs. Walker’s anniversary, too! There’s so much to do: buy gifts, choose decorations and put them up, and also pick out and send Valentine’s Day cards! Join the Walker family in the peaceful town of Animalville, and you’re sure to have a good time! Features - 40+ hours of brain-tickling gameplay - 100 cumulative episodes, 700 clutter levels, and 100 puzzles - Colorful graphics, funny dialogue and cute characters - Adjustable modes: Easy with no time limits, and Difficult with the time limits but more points to earn! - Festive images, items, animation and music for entering the spirit of Christmas, Thanksgiving, and Valentine’s Day! - New soft sounds and music masterpieces, relaxing ambient sounds, and more, for comfortable and enjoyable playing - Learn lots of facts about winter holiday traditions around the globe!
Title: Shopping Clutter: Winter Break 5 Game Bundle

description: Stack all kinds of mouth-watering baked goods, from croissants to cookie hearts and everything in between! Grab your spatula, lift the baked goods out of the oven, and put them on display so that customers can buy them! With a steady stream of hungry customers waiting in line, it's up to you to deliver their orders quickly and efficiently! Satisfy your customers and earn money that you can spend to hire additional staff and expand your bakery! Unlock new recipes and serve even more delicious pastries! Need a helping hand? Invite your friend to play in local co-op mode and expand your bakery to the next level! Grab your aprons and get ready to bake up a storm in Baking Time together! Features: - Bake over 30 different pastries that your customers won't resist! - Collect baked goods with a spatula and put them on the display to sell them! - Operate the cash register and satisfy your customers' appetites! - Earn tons of money to unlock new levels of your bakery! - Hire staff to help you collect the baked goods much faster! - Unlock 32 adorable animals that boost the cash you and your bakers collect! - Upgrade your character and workers to walk faster or carry more pastries! - Perform baker's tasks and claim your rewards - Prepare baked goods for special large orders! - Feed your cookie monsters to get money each second - Use the teleport to move faster between levels - Get caught up in the cooking fever and try not to get hungry! So what are you waiting for? Keep those ovens hot and bake on!
Title: Baking Time!

description: Stack all kinds of mouth-watering baked goods, from croissants to cookie hearts and everything in between! Grab your spatula, lift the baked goods out of the oven, and put them on display so that customers can buy them! With a steady stream of hungry customers waiting in line, it's up to you to deliver their orders quickly and efficiently! Features: - Bake over 30 different pastries that your customers won't resist! - Collect baked goods with a spatula and put them on the display to sell them! - Operate the cash register and satisfy your customers' appetites! - Use your diamonds to unlock over 90 adorable animals that will increase your movement speed, capacity and the cash you collect! - Earn tons of money to unlock new levels of your bakery! - Hire staff to help you collect the baked goods much faster! - Upgrade your character and workers to walk faster or carry more pastries! - Perform baker's tasks and claim your rewards - Prepare baked goods for special large orders! - Feed your cookie monsters to get money each second - Use the teleport to move faster between levels - Get caught up in the cooking fever and try not to get hungry! Satisfy your customers and earn money that you can spend to hire additional staff and expand your bakery! Unlock new recipes and serve even more delicious pastries! Need a helping hand? Invite your friend to play in local co-op mode and expand your bakery to the next level! Grab your aprons and get ready to bake up a storm in Baking Time together! So what are you waiting for? Keep those ovens hot and bake on!
Title: Baking Time!: Complete Edition

description: Footage style first person game where you are a journalist who returns to his country in search of answers about the death of his mother. This investigation will lead him to discover his origin in a place far from the world where terror lurks. Main features: -Use of camera in photo and video mode with different uses. -Use of lighter and inventory. -Dark narrative in a hostile environment.
Title: POMBERO: The Lord of the Night

description: Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you step into the shoes of an elite SWAT operative in "Critical Strike Shooter: SWAT Rescue Missions". Immerse yourself in heart-pounding first-person action and lead your squad to victory in intense hostage rescue scenarios. Are you ready to become the ultimate savior in this thrilling shooter game? Features: 1. Command a diverse team: Lead a squad with unique specialists like assault troops, medics, demolitions experts, and snipers. 2. Strategic planning: Analyze enemy positions, plan your approach, and adapt to dynamic situations in high-risk environments. 3. Intense firefights: Master a variety of weapons and equipment to eliminate threats with precision in fast-paced gunfights. 4. Gripping narrative: Unravel a web of intrigue as you uncover the truth behind the missions through immersive cutscenes. 5. Conquer challenges: Overcome unexpected setbacks, environmental hazards, and enemy reinforcements through quick thinking and decisive action. 6. Test your courage: Lead your team into dangerous situations, demonstrate bravery under fire, and emerge victorious against all odds. Your courage and tactical prowess will be put to the ultimate test in the fight against injustice. Are you ready to answer the call of duty and become the ultimate hero?
Title: Critical Strike Shooter: SWAT Rescue Missions

description: Year 2068, Lupa Corps, a company specialized in creating domestic artificial intelligence, is about to revolutionize the world with its new creation, Minerva. You are a detective and you receive a call to investigate a murder. Upon arrival, you realize that the victim was a well-known hacker wanted by justice. At that moment a story begins where nothing is what it seems. DETECTIVE Minerva Case is a crime deduction and resolution game, your mission will be to understand what happened in each crime. You will need to have 100% senses to find all the evidence, even if it is hidden. Once you have the evidence, you must solve each case in your office. This game is designed for lovers of science fiction, crimes and original stories. Minerva case, is a title divided between history and crime resolution. You will go through a total of 6 scenarios to understand what is happening with Minerva and Lupa Corps. - Collect evidence. - Make deductions. - Solve cases in your office. - Understand the motivations. An ending you don't expect.
Title: Detective - Minerva Case

description: Spring has sprung in these 5 colorful, brain-tickling games, for players of all ages! It’s time for all the creatures of Animalville to venture outside for Spring! The Walkers were disappointed by the absence of a place in their town where children of all ages and their parents could spend pleasant time together… so the whole family decided to arrange the perfect playground! But as it turns out, it’s not as easy as they thought. There’s lots to clean up and sort out before the animals of the town can enjoy their new playground! Help out in Shopping Clutter: The Best Playground. Then, help the family decorate Auntie Sheep’s flower shop! She noticed there were not enough blooming flowers or plants hanging from balconies… so she decided to change that for the better. Clean up her new store’s shelves, and find all the necessary equipment—not to mention flowers!—in Shopping Clutter: Blooming Tale. Before the season ends, Auntie Sheep decides to make her old dream come true, and visit the towns of the world with the most beautiful flowers! While she’s gone, Sloth Walker is in charge of her flower shop. But that may not have been the best idea… Now, the shop is ruined! Jump into Shopping Clutter: From Gloom to Bloom, and save the day! Now, it’s time for the birthday of one of the Walker family’s own! Since birthdays are every kid’s favorite holiday, it’s time to prepare the party. With lots of guests on their way, food that needs to be served, and decorations to put up, the Walkers are in chaos! Show your best skills in Shopping Clutter: Happy Birthday to make Hare’s party the best he’s ever had! Finally, the Walkers embark on a new challenge… opening their own coffee shop! Since Animalville is lacking the perfect coffee house, the Walkers take it upon themselves. Now, all they need are your sharp eyes and skillful hands to get the best equipment and some stylish furniture for the coffeehouse. Join a new amazing coffee adventure in Shopping Clutter: Coffeehouse! Bask in 5 clutter games, full of joy and growth as the flowers bloom and the weather turns! Don’t miss out on Shopping Clutter: Spring Blossom. Features - 40+ hours of brain-tickling gameplay - 100 cumulative episodes, 700 clutter levels, and 100 puzzles - Colorful graphics, funny dialogue and cute characters - Adjustable modes: Easy with no time limits, and Difficult with the time limits but more points to earn! - Play with new items from various themes: birthday party, coffee shop, and more - Enjoy bright, colorful spring graphics, lots of flowers, and more - Relax as you play, with soft sounds, music masterpieces, ambient music, and more
Title: Shopping Clutter: Spring Blossom 5 Game Bundle

description: Play 5 spooky and mysterious brain-teasing games, for players of all ages! Tackle hundreds of colorful levels full of obstacles to uncover the items you need! Train your sharp eyes as you look for matching pairs, sets of three, items that satisfy categories like type and color, and more. Drop your finds on conveyor belts and watch the points stack up! Then, unscramble beautiful pictures in tile and sliding puzzles. JetDogs’ Shopping Clutter series always offers puzzle-hungry players new surprises and adventures! First, you’ll need to put on your detective cap… there’s two cases in Animalville that need your investigation skills! When Hare’s brand new bicycle is stolen, Squirrel takes matters into her own paws… and together, the family sets out to open Walkers’ Detective Agency! Shopping Clutter: Detective Agency is a whole new adventure. Find everything you need to gather evidence, question witnesses, and decorate the new office. Then… It's time to find the dastardly criminal! The next case comes up faster than anyone could imagine. Days before its grand opening, Animalville’s newest restaurant is robbed. Search for the missing recipes, catch the thief, and get the grand opening back on track in Shopping Clutter: Food Detectives! When long, matted fur begins to interfere with the townspeople’s daily lives, someone has to act! Giant clumps of fur fly all over the town, everyone is sneezing, and scissors are being bought up…. Animalville is on the brink of an unprecedented catastrophe! The Walkers decide to remedy the situation, so it’s time to set up shop in Shopping Clutter: Beauty Salon! It’s finally everyone’s favorite, spooky time of year… Halloween! Help the Walker family to decorate their yard for Halloween. Are they up to the task of winning the yearly contest for the scariest yard display? Not with empty shelves in the stores and everything such a mess…! Use your eagle eye to join them in their search for all the best Halloween decorations in Shopping Clutter: Halloween at the Walkers. Finally, Mr. Rat’s beloved antique store has fallen on hard times. To bring in new customers, he intends to decorate the store in the style of Count Dracula! But the liar needs lots of vampire staff, treats, monsters, and a talented person to find all this amidst pre-Halloween chaos and clutter! Will you help save Mr. Rat’s store? Embark on 5 new clutter puzzle adventures in this bundle, Shopping Clutter: Halloween Mystery! Features - 40+ hours of brain-tickling gameplay - 100 cumulative episodes, 700 clutter levels, and 100 puzzles - Colorful graphics, funny dialogue and cute characters - Adjustable modes: Easy with no time limits, and Difficult with the time limits but more points to earn! - Face Mr. and Mrs. Dracula, mummies, and fascinating vampire stories! Plus, visit Dracula’s lair and stay alive! - Use your sharp eyes to find the worst criminal in Animalville!
Title: Shopping Clutter: Halloween Mystery 5 Game Bundle

Plus, visit Dracula’s lair and stay alive! - Use your sharp eyes to find the worst criminal in Animalville!

description: Spring has sprung in these 5 colorful, brain-tickling games, for players of all ages! It’s time for all the creatures of Animalville to venture outside for Spring! The Walkers were disappointed by the absence of a place in their town where children of all ages and their parents could spend pleasant time together… so the whole family decided to arrange the perfect playground! But as it turns out, it’s not as easy as they thought. There’s lots to clean up and sort out before the animals of the town can enjoy their new playground! Help out in Shopping Clutter: The Best Playground. Then, help the family decorate Auntie Sheep’s flower shop! She noticed there were not enough blooming flowers or plants hanging from balconies… so she decided to change that for the better. Clean up her new store’s shelves, and find all the necessary equipment—not to mention flowers!—in Shopping Clutter: Blooming Tale. Before the season ends, Auntie Sheep decides to make her old dream come true, and visit the towns of the world with the most beautiful flowers! While she’s gone, Sloth Walker is in charge of her flower shop. But that may not have been the best idea… Now, the shop is ruined! Jump into Shopping Clutter: From Gloom to Bloom, and save the day! Now, it’s time for the birthday of one of the Walker family’s own! Since birthdays are every kid’s favorite holiday, it’s time to prepare the party. With lots of guests on their way, food that needs to be served, and decorations to put up, the Walkers are in chaos! Show your best skills in Shopping Clutter: Happy Birthday to make Hare’s party the best he’s ever had! Finally, the Walkers embark on a new challenge… opening their own coffee shop! Since Animalville is lacking the perfect coffee house, the Walkers take it upon themselves. Now, all they need are your sharp eyes and skillful hands to get the best equipment and some stylish furniture for the coffeehouse. Join a new amazing coffee adventure in Shopping Clutter: Coffeehouse! Bask in 5 clutter games, full of joy and growth as the flowers bloom and the weather turns! Don’t miss out on Shopping Clutter: Spring Blossom. Features - 40+ hours of brain-tickling gameplay - 100 cumulative episodes, 700 clutter levels, and 100 puzzles - Colorful graphics, funny dialogue and cute characters - Adjustable modes: Easy with no time limits, and Difficult with the time limits but more points to earn! - Play with new items from various themes: birthday party, coffee shop, and more - Enjoy bright, colorful spring graphics, lots of flowers, and more - Relax as you play, with soft sounds, music masterpieces, ambient music, and more
Title: Shopping Clutter: Spring Blossom 5 Game Bundle

description: Play 5 different, brain-jogging games, for players of all ages! Take on tons of colorful levels, where the items you need are hidden around, beside, and below many other things! Train your sharp eyes as you look for matching pairs, sets of three, items that satisfy categories like type and color, and more. Then, unscramble beautiful pictures in tile and sliding puzzles. These 5 games from JetDogs’ Shopping Clutter series are sure to surprise and delight! Hop on your favorite sled and slide right into a wintery place where magic prevails! The streets sparkle with bright lights, music resounds all over, and even adults start to believe in miracles again! This year, the Walkers are putting up a magnificent tree. But decorating it is not so easy… Help them find the best ornaments for their Christmas tree, and save the Walkers’ Christmas in Shopping Clutter: Christmas Poetree. Then, just when the Walkers were planning a little trip, Uncle Rat and Auntie Sheep turn up at their door… with tickets for a Christmas cruise! Join the family, travel the world and go ashore to admire the sights. Then, return home to celebrate Christmas in Shopping Clutter: Christmas Cruise. Cap off the winter season with Shopping Clutter: Winter Garden. Uncle Rat wants to set up a greenhouse where his beloved wife Auntie Sheep can grow her flowers all year round. It’s pretty hard to find green plants in winter, but the Walkers are not going to leave Auntie Sheep feeling blue until spring! But, the fall holidays can’t be left out! The Walkers have decided to arrange a feast in Animalville—and, being a real expert on Thanksgiving Day traditions, goodhearted Uncle Tom Turkey came to help. Join the fun in Shopping Clutter: A Perfect Thanksgiving! Finally… love blooms in Shopping Clutter: Love is in the Air! Because Valentine’s Day isn’t just Valentine’s Day… it’s Mr. and Mrs. Walker’s anniversary, too! There’s so much to do: buy gifts, choose decorations and put them up, and also pick out and send Valentine’s Day cards! Join the Walker family in the peaceful town of Animalville, and you’re sure to have a good time! Features - 40+ hours of brain-tickling gameplay - 100 cumulative episodes, 700 clutter levels, and 100 puzzles - Colorful graphics, funny dialogue and cute characters - Adjustable modes: Easy with no time limits, and Difficult with the time limits but more points to earn! - Festive images, items, animation and music for entering the spirit of Christmas, Thanksgiving, and Valentine’s Day! - New soft sounds and music masterpieces, relaxing ambient sounds, and more, for comfortable and enjoyable playing - Learn lots of facts about winter holiday traditions around the globe!
Title: Shopping Clutter: Winter Break 5 Game Bundle

description: Become the head of a motorcycle mechanic empire in a realistic simulation game. Start with a small garage, upgrade and buy bigger ones with new possibilities. Take orders from customers, find old bikes and breathe new life into it. While playing Motorcycle Mechanic Simulator: - enjoy unlimited timed gameplay with many types of motorcycles - try not to get lost among the 400 parts that make up each of the motorcycles - explore a huge library of additional parts - refurbish old and build new bikes - accept orders from customers, earn money and gain experience points - choose a garage that suits you and furnish it - test bikes while driving on test tracks - explore landfills in search of unique parts - check what the store has to offer in parts, appliances and furniture - personalize motorcycle parts by painting and applying stickers
Title: Motorcycle Mechanic Simulator 2021

description: BroodStar is a classic arcade shoot’em up with heavy roguelike elements. Careful, though… the vastness of space contains many formidable enemies. If you fall along the way, you have to start over — the only thing you’ll bring with you are the upgrade modules you collected in your past runs, in the form of research points that augment your ship. Will they be enough to get you through hordes of unknown creatures and monstrous bosses, and fulfill your quest of defeating the living planet — the BroodStar? Features ・12 Procedurally Generated Levels with Random Enemies, Events and Bosses ・Challenges and Leaderboards ・7 Main and 6 Sub Weapon Types ・200 Unique Upgrades ・Research System ・Seed System ・Challenging Bosses and Boss Variations ・Stage Modifiers and Events
Title: BroodStar

description: What is a recklessly adventurous kid to do when he ends up stuck between life and death? In Ghost Teen Escape from Limbo, you’ll have to exploit your ghost form to solve a multitude of tricky platforming puzzles if there’s any hope of returning to your home amongst the living. Explore 50 single-screen puzzles in black-and-white 2D pixel art style Brainteasing stages start out simple but gradually increase in complexity and challenge. Keep trying puzzles as many times as it takes and find your way back to the living world! Features: • Enjoy precision platforming in black-and-white 2D style! • Avoid traps or intentionally use them to “die” and shift to your ghost form. • Use your ghostly abilities to float and pass through obstacles in order to solve puzzles! • Collect keys and unlock doors to progress through 50 unique stages. • Find a way to escape limbo and return to the living world! This product entitles you to download both the digital PS4® version and the digital PS5® version of this game.
Title: Ghost Teen Escape from Limbo

description: MORDHAU Platinum Edition contains the Main game and 7 DLC packs: -MORDHAU main game -Adventurer pack -Archduke Armor set -Dragon Armor set -Lion Armor set -Grotesque Armor set -Continental Voice pack 1 -Continental Voice pack 2
Title: MORDHAU Platinum Edition

description: MORDHAU Platinum Edition contains the Main game and 7 DLC packs: -MORDHAU main game -Adventurer pack -Archduke Armor set -Dragon Armor set -Lion Armor set -Grotesque Armor set -Continental Voice pack 1 -Continental Voice pack 2
Title: MORDHAU Platinum Edition

description: Father's Day Journey is a delightful puzzle game designed to celebrate the enchanting atmosphere of Father's Day. Flip Father's Day themed cards to uncover matching pairs. The game offers four different difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert. Each level challenges players' memory and attention skills. Father's Day Journey, with its four distinct difficulty levels, adds an extra layer of joy to your Father's Day celebrations!
Title: Father's Day Journey
Publisher: ERIK GAMES YAZILIM OYUN TEKNOLOJILERI TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI

description: Sinister danger lurks in Cypress Ridge. Experience three unique adventures spanning classic '90s fixed camera survival horror, an insane on-rails shooter, and a deep investigative visual novel as zombies and dinosaurs tear a sleepy midwestern city apart. Oh, and did we mention the visual novel also has a JRPG built in!? This collection includes three full games - Outbreak: The Fedora Files What Lydia Knows, Railbreak and Dinobreak. Outbreak RPG is accessible inside What Lydia Knows.
Title: Outbreak: Blood & Teeth Collection

description: Jump into the spinning circle of O-VOID, a one-button arcade game. In this super minimal action runner, you’ll be jumping over obstacles with one button. But this is not a regular platformer! The entire level can change direction or flip upside down to throw you off. Are you skilled enough to survive every challenge? Features: - Simple one-button gameplay inside mind-bending geometry - 7 randomly generated levels for endless replayability - Unique and pumping chiptune soundtrack - Near-impossible challenges to unlock player customizations
Title: O-VOID: Console Edition

description: Embark on an adrenaline-pumping adventure with Offroad Jeep Driving! This immersive 3D game challenges you to navigate through rugged terrains and complete a variety of offroad tasks. Each level presents new obstacles and missions that will test your driving skills and determination. Game Features: Challenging Levels: Tackle a series of levels, each designed with unique offroad challenges that push your driving abilities to the limit. Earn and Upgrade: Successfully complete tasks to earn money. Use your earnings to purchase better jeeps and powerful upgrades, enhancing your offroad capabilities. Realistic 3D Graphics: Experience the thrill of offroad driving with stunning, lifelike 3D graphics that make every rock, hill, and mud puddle come to life. Diverse Terrains: Drive through diverse and treacherous terrains, from rocky mountain paths to muddy forest trails. Dynamic Weather: Face changing weather conditions that add an extra layer of challenge to your offroad adventures. Customizable Controls: Enjoy smooth and intuitive controls that you can customize to suit your driving style. Whether you're a seasoned offroad enthusiast or a newcomer to the genre, Offroad Jeep Driving offers endless excitement and challenges. Master the art of offroad driving, upgrade your jeeps, and conquer every level to become the ultimate offroad champion!
Title: Offroad Jeep Driving

description: D MISSILE is a fast-paced one-button game. Your goal is to launch missiles and shoot down enemy projectiles falling from the top. Press a button to launch a missile, you can launch up to 3 missiles at a time. Hold a button to make the launched missiles rotate clockwise. The game is over when any of the enemy projectiles hits the ground.
Title: D MISSILE

description: Join the grid and Be One of the 20. Drive like the Greatest in EA SPORTS™ F1® 24, the official video game of the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship™. Featuring an overhauled Career mode and the all-new EA SPORTS Dynamic Handling. Drive the future in EA SPORTS™ F1® 24 Season Three: Discover the future of motorsport in F1® 24's Season Three with the 2024 Formula 2™ cars featuring this year's drivers & teams. Compete in exciting gameplay events with the return of Elimination Mode and a new Pro Challenge. ● Unleash Your Champion: Discover the newly innovated Driver Career mode with new gameplay rooted in the sport or team up with a friend in two-player career. ● EA SPORTS™ Dynamic Handling: Get to grips with more authentic handling. The latest physics gives you more control over how your personal driving style impacts your car’s performance and race strategy. ● Challenge Career is a new, interactive feature in the F1® season that offers episodic competitive play with unique events and challenges, allows community members to compete for high scores, and invites them to influence future content by voting on social media. ● Ignite Your Passion with Fanzones these allow you to support your favorite team and driver, collaborate with other fans to achieve goals, raise your profile in the standings, and unlock unique rewards and items. This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items.
Title: F1® 24

description: This bundle contains: - Asterix & Obelix XXL: Romastered - Asterix & Obelix XXL2 - Asterix & Obelix XXL3
Title: Asterix & Obelix Collection - 3 in 1

description: Welcome to Grand Prix Racing Universal: where the spirit of rally racing meets the pursuit of Grand Prix glory on a variety of thrilling circuits! Prepare to immerse yourself in the ultimate console racing experience, where every curve, every straightaway, and every overtaking opportunity will test your skills to the limit. Dynamic Racing Action: Strap into high-performance rally cars or rugged pickup and unleash their power on a diverse range of challenging circuits purpose-built for adrenaline-fueled competition. You'll have to compete in 12 vehicules races on 3 levels of difficulty. Single Player or Local Multiplayer: Choose your preferred mode of play and embark on a quest for Grand Prix glory in single-player mode, or challenge a friend in local 2-player mode. With split-screen action, the competition heats up as you both aim for victory on the track. Thrilling Grand Prix Challenges: Compete in a series of exhilarating Grand Prix challenges, each set on a variety of circuits where every race is a thrilling test of skill and strategy. Intense Time Trials: Hone your racing skills and master every corner in intense time trial challenges. Race against the clock as you strive to set new track records and prove yourself as the ultimate speed demon. Garage Customization: Earn coins by winning races and use them to enhance your vehicle in the garage section. From performance upgrades to cosmetic enhancements, fine-tune every aspect of your ride to gain the edge on the competition. Stunning Graphics and Realistic Sound: Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action with stunning graphics that bring each circuit to life in vivid detail. From the roar of the engines to the screech of tires, every sound is meticulously crafted to put you in the driver's seat. Get ready to rev your engines and chase Grand Prix glory in Grand Prix Racing Universal. Are you ready to conquer a variety of thrilling circuits and etch your name in motorsport history?
Title: Grand Prix Racing Universal
Publisher: Benoit Varasse trading as Pix Arts

description: Hand In Hand is a 2D split screen puzzle platformer, where the player can control two characters at once, or two players can play in co-op mode on one device. A TOUCHING STORY Two soulmates live in a fairytale world. But when evil came to their world, they lost each other. Now both of them need to head towards each other, facing many difficulties and dangers along the way. And only by finding a fragile connection between one another and going hand in hand will they be able to defeat evil and meet again. It's a story about how we can help one another even when you're apart, and be far from one another even when you're nearby. It's a story about the importance of relationships and mutual support. But every story has an even deeper meaning... SPLIT SCREEN The game works in splitscreen mode, with one character on each screen in their respective locations. The game has two modes. The first is single-player mode, where one player simultaneously controls both characters with one joystick. In this mode, the player must demonstrate sophisticated controller skills. The second is local co-op mode, where two players control the characters using two joysticks. Here, both players control their respective characters. Each mode has its advantages. Single-player mode requires you to show great dexterity and reaction speed, and co-op mode allows you to feel the joy of playing the game with your family or friend. Try both game modes, we hope you'll like it and enjoy completing it. THE CHARACTERS INTERACT WITH AND HELP EACH OTHER Each character has their own part of the level in a common location. However, some parts of the level are interconnected. This means that the characters can interact and help each other complete the level. Characters can move keys and objects from one part of the screen to another, and most puzzles are need to be solved by both characters working together, connecting parts of the screen and solving puzzles together. EPIC BOSSES The game has epic boss battles. Each boss represents the world of shadows that has invaded this fairytale forest and wants to plunge all the inhabitants of this fairytale world into the horror of eternal darkness. Our brave heroes, Lina and Minho, must defeat each of the bosses so that peace and prosperity will once again reign in the fairy forest. Boss battles take place without splitscreen, and are designed to be played by just one of the characters, so each character must defeat their evil shadow bosses. PUZZLES On their way through the collapsing fairy-tale world, the characters will constantly encounter various puzzles like closed doors, laser beams with reflectors, ancient mechanisms and ruins, labyrinths, and caves full of dangers. Our heroes will be able to overcome all difficulties, but each will have to make every effort to pass these trials and help their companion.
Title: Hand in Hand

description: Embark on an relaxing adventure as you take on the role of a courageous paper plane hunting down evil ghosts that haunt vibrant worlds across dimensions. Soar through captivating landscapes, from mystical forests to scary mansions, in search of these malevolent spirits. Utilize your flying skills and shoot all the ghosts, restore peace, and bring harmony to the realms in this visually stunning game. Paper Dash – Invasion of Greed is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun finding and shooting little ghosts. Fast, relaxed, chaotic - You are free to enjoy the game any way you see fit as the only enemies of the game are ghosts that stay in place floating ominously. The movement is fast but the world itself is somewhat peaceful. This enables you to lean back and enjoy the different levels and the sensation of flying. It is an excellent game for relaxing and blowing off some steam after an exhausting day of hassle.
Title: Paper Dash - Invasion of Greed

description: sCATch 2 is a puzzle game where the objective is to find the exit after painting all the walls of the maze with the right colors and using items with different mechanics. Features: 40 levels; Different mechanics; Original chiptune 8-bit soundtrack; 8-bit Pixel Art;
Title: sCATch 2: The Painter Cat

description: Experience the true essence of rural life in Tractor Farming Simulator 3D! Dive into the immersive world of agriculture as you take on the role of a skilled farmer tasked with managing your own farm. From plowing and planting to harvesting and selling crops, every step of the farming process is in your hands. In Tractor Farming Simulator 3D, players embark on a journey to build their farming empire. Complete a variety of tasks and challenges to earn money, then reinvest your earnings to upgrade to more powerful tractors and equipment. With each upgrade, you'll unlock new opportunities to increase your productivity and profitability. With stunning 3D graphics and realistic gameplay mechanics, Tractor Farming Simulator 3D offers an authentic farming experience like never before. Are you ready to till the soil, sow the seeds, and reap the rewards? Step into the driver's seat and become the master of your own agricultural destiny in Tractor Farming Simulator 3D!
Title: Tractor Farming Simulator 3D

description: Play as Hauntii, a naive but brave ghost on a relentless quest for answers. A mysterious race of glowing creatures, known as Eternians, guides lost souls to an ominous central tower where they appear to ascend to a higher plane. They look like angels, but no one really knows who they are, nor where they came from. Unleash ghostly powers to possess both inhabitants and environment, unveiling various solutions to combat and puzzle challenges. Unravel the mysteries of Eternity and shape your fate in a mesmerising adventure like no other! Look and Feel The game employs a unique hand-crafted art style, making use of line art, animation and a striking two-tone palette. The camera is a character in itself, sweeping over and zooming in and out of the environment to emphasise certain scenes and provide direction to the player. Meanwhile, Hauntii’s dynamic soundtrack sways and swells with the action on-screen, creating a captivating audiovisual experience.
